description: Recycling is necessary to keep our planet clean, we all know that. But, have you ever considered that picking up the trash might also be a fun thing to do? Are you ready to take the ultimate challenge and save our planet? Play the game and become the Master of Recycling! Beware, it won’t be easy. Careless people have filled the sky with all kinds of litter. Will you be able to recognize which waste falls into the correct recycling category? First four levels challenge you to separate the trash precisely in only 1 minute. Every time you make a mistake and pick up the red bag or collect the trash that is not the part of your current mission your score will lower. Pay attention when you see a storm coming, it might change your focus! When you learn enough, you progress to the biggest challenge awaiting. The final level truly tests your recycling expertise. While the sky fills with all sorts of waste instructions change each time you see the storm coming. Be careful to avoid the lethal rocks and not to lose gas, otherwise your mission will come to an end. So, what are you waiting for? Tilt you iphone left and right and catch as much nasty trash as you possibly can. The planet needs you!

Drive jumbo school buses in realistic city environment and enjoy controlling the steering wheel of this simulation game. Kids are waiting for schoolbus don’t be late be there on time. Fulfill your transporter duties on time to unlock more challenging missions. Pickup kids and passenger from bus stand and drop them ahead to their destination. Press the Start button for starting your bus engine; shift the gear to drive, press race pedal to drive your schoolbus automobile from one destination to next checkpoint. Park your bus within given time or your mission be failed. You have various kinds of various bus models with different engine horsepower and power steering control to drive them in more perfect way. Learn to steer jumbo size tractor through this amazing and challenging game play. Free roam or play as career mode to master your skills. Your task is to park your vehicle at the bus stop within the given time and had to pick and drop kids, parents and passenger on next destination before timer goes off. Best driver simulator for young age kids, youngsters, teens and mature people who love to play time race games in their smart phone devices. Features: Various amazing buses model with different engine horsepower Challenging 20 city levels to master your driving skills Enjoy free roaming in urban area and park your big transporter vehicle to explore the city map Realistic graphics with real physics for best driving experience Amazing background sound to enhance your gaming experience Friendly environment no violence, nudity, shock, femininity, thrills etc And a bunch of features we are working on

《我的三國志》是myPlay1首款融合動作格鬥的3D策略手遊，以Q版超萌的形式呈現精彩三國故事，帶你穿越歷史，親身體驗群雄爭霸的時代! 全新鬥將系統，享受稱霸群雄的快感 老玩家回流拿千元大禮 ★全3D武將任你使喚，熱血PK沒有極限★ 超可愛3D模組打造三國武將，幽默逗趣，動作帥氣，令你愛不釋手。獨一無二的單挑模式，讓超萌武將同場較勁，施展酷炫的必殺技！ ★百種技能任你搭配，獨創最強陣法★ 遊戲具備多種武將技能，可依照技能屬性自由搭配，結合部隊的兵種特性，創造屬於自己的最強陣法。運用你的智慧和謀略，橫掃中原，一統天下！ ★將星雲集，百位名將等你搜集★ 【將星譜】有最齊全的三國武將，每位武將不僅有豐富的養成要素，也有各自專屬的天命，只要湊齊彼此有淵源的武將，還能聯手出擊，觸發額外的技能！ ★三國群星搞怪演出，顛覆歷史寫新章★ 超過上百場的經典戰役，主線劇情再加支線任務，誰說歷史不能改變？最特別的動作策略玩法，最華麗的英雄演出，最想不到的劇情發展，盡在《我的三國志》！ WeChat ID拿好康享資訊：myplay1fun 粉絲專頁： http://www.facebook.com/twmsg/ 巴哈姆特討論區： http://forum.gamer.com.tw/A.php?bsn=26151

Shift Schedule ­ The versatile shift roster / calendar app that allows you to set up your shift schedule and program the alarm clock per shift once and it will do the rest. The app has many additional features that can be programmed depending on your needs and what you need to see at a glance. ● Create a single or multi shift and color coded days are displayed for any shift and any period ● View your schedule or switch between schedules. This allows you to compare free days of colleagues etc. If you move to a different shift, easily set it as your new schedule ● Customize what is displayed on your roster / calendar and set the individual shift colors, font colors and font size ● Edit individual days due to leave, sick days, and shorter or longer hours etc. for hours worked calculations. ● View statistic of hours worked per shift and per month ● Export your shift schedule to Google Calendar ● Share your shift schedule with others by exporting them to .pdf or Excel. Exporting to .pdf also allow you to create a beautiful wall calendar with a picture ● Use one of the many widgets to view your schedule including additional information instantly ● Snooze or cancel the alarm in different ways including shake and flip User’s Manual: http://shapp.16mb.com/usersmanual/ The app is free and fully functional during the trial period. After the trial period, some features will be disabled and you will need to purchase the donation key to use them. Benefits of purchasing the donation key: ● No ads ● No annoying dialogs ● Full support for non­periodic and individual schedules ● Customizable actions for long tap ● Additional icons for quick switching between edit and view modes ● Export to other formats ­ .xml, csv (Excel), Google Calendar ● Automatically receive all future enhancements Link to purchase the donation: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ochkarik.shiftscheduledonate

description: Welcome to Color Blindness Test, a small game that allows you to check your color vision. The Ishihara Color Test is an example of a color perception test for red-green color deficiencies. It was named after its designer, Dr. Shinobu Ishihara. The test consists of a number of colored plates, called Ishihara plates, each of which contains a circle of dots appearing randomized in color and size. Within the pattern are dots which form a number or shape clearly visible to those with normal color vision, and invisible, or difficult to see, to those with a red-green color vision defect, or the other way around. The seemingly random colored dots are arranged in such a fashion that a person with normal color vision will see a single-digit or two-digit number within the array of dots, while a colorblind person will either be unable to see a number or will see a different number than the one seen by a person with normal color vision. A color blind test should be given to anyone considering a profession where accurate color perception is essential. Examples include car driver, electricians, commercial artists, designers, technicians, and certain manufacturing and marketing personnel.

Velodroid is the simplest and most accurate GPS Bike Computer App on the market. Designed with the specific needs of cyclists in mind, Velodroid presents your ride information on clear and uncluttered screens. It can even provide in-ride statistics using a speech capability! The Elevation Profiles shown for the Tour de France are pretty neat, right? Well now you can access the same data as the professional cyclists. Velodroid makes it possible, providing Elevation Profiles using the most accurate altitude data available. Velodroid is generally correct to within 1m, while a normal phone GPS can only promise accuracy to the nearest 30m. However, if you are concerned about conserving battery, Velodroid has a nifty power saving mode which will use the GPS data during the ride, and allow you to update to the more accurate data when you return. Velodroid maps your ride over familiar Google Maps satellite imagery (hybrid satellite/map images) in real-time, allowing you to quickly determine your location and check your progress. The intuitive panning and zooming tools allow you to navigate during your ride and keep yourself on track. Whether you are training for an event, or just cycling to keep fit, Velodroid has some great tools to lend a hand. The intervals timer allows you to set up a training regime, and Velodroid is the only app that lets you see your improving fitness over time with its innovative fitness chart. Velodroid takes care of all the basic bicycle computer functions in style, providing you a large easy-to-read speedometer, and a broad set of route and personal best statistics in your choice of Metric or Imperial units. Velodroid can even keep the screen awake if you choose to use it as bike computer. All of the important route statistics are covered, including: - Current Speed - Trip Time - Route Distance - Average Speed - Maximum Speed - Current Elevation - Maximum Elevation - Elevation Gain - Current Gradient - Maximum Gradient Sharing is well catered for, Velodroid can share your ride to any app that supports sharing, even letting you use an app like TweetDeck to handle both Facebook and Twitter posts at once. With Velodroid, your ride data is yours, it allows you to export and email your rides in a variety of formats including GPX, KML (for Google Earth), TCX and CSV. It also has integrated functionality for directly uploading your ride to a RideWithGPS.com account where you can access a treasure trove of post-ride analysis tools. Take Velodroid for a ride today! We're keen to hear your feedback, issues or requests at support@velodroid.com / http://twitter.com/#!/velodroid / http://www.velodroid.com
release_text: Recent additions: - Red and Random Themes - Fix for deleting rides - Enhanced ride naming engine - Optimisations to save precious battery power.

description: ※Android5.0の端末では、ご利用できません。ご注意をお願いします。 ※検索データが表示されないお客様へ 　　最新のデータの更新をお願いします。 　　⇒[設定/使い方]→[カロリー情報の更新]で最新のデータに更新 ※iPhone版カロリー管理からAndroid版カロリー管理へのバックアップデータの移行は出来ません。 　ご注意をお願いします。 ＜最近の変更点＞ 13.9.30 ・お気に入り登録・マイカテゴリの不具合を修正しました。 ・条件によって数字の入力が困難だったものを緩和しました。 *-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-* 運動しても、食べる量減らしても痩せない、なぜ？ 実は意外とカロリー摂取しているのに気付いてないだけ。 カロリー管理なら、その実態が分かり確実に減らせます。 ＜食べたものが身体になる！＞ 運動しても痩せないのは、それ以上にカロリー摂取過多だから！ 一駅３０分歩いた消費カロリーは約１００kcal・・・炭酸飲料コップ一杯分しか消費しません。 ちょっと間食したものが高カロリーだった、低カロリーだと思って食べていたものが信じられない高カロリーだったら、せっかく運動しても効果薄くなってしまいます。 ダイエット、健康管理にカロリー過多は禁物なんです！ よくビール腹といって、お酒を飲むこと＝太ると思っている人多いと思いますが、アルコールのカロリーは大半が熱として体外に放出されてしまいます。 問題は、お酒に刺激された胃が求める「脂っこい」食べ物です。 どんな食べ物がカロリー高いのか？低いのか？ 他のアプリのように、ただメモするだけではカロリーは分からず摂取過多は防げません。 豊富なカロリーデータが、食べ物のカロリーを知ることにつながります。

description: It’s time for a road trip. Buckle up. The road ahead starts here. The 2014 Snap-on Franchisee Conference is August 15 – 17 at the Gaylord Palms Resort & Convention Center in Orlando, FL. And this app will provide all the necessary information to make sure you take in everything SFC 2014 has to offer. This well organized resource provides a detailed event schedule you can personalize to create your own agenda, interactive property maps, full seminar descriptions, times and locations, product expo information, including descriptions for each exhibitor, information on evening entertainment, event photos and the ability to take notes and create to-dos. Climb aboard and get the download. Start fine tuning your plans. Get ready for the ride of your life. SFC 2014. Ride On.

** 함께하는 재미, 위미(weme)! ** # 상상을 초월하는 편대비행, 에어헌터 전격 출격! # 강화를 넘어선 진화! 서브 유닛 장착! 출격준비~~끝! 쏟아지는 탄막 속에서 벌어지는 거대보스와의 한판승부! 아슬아슬 리스크샷과 친구들과 함께하는 상상초월 편대비행! 자~~~모두들 에어헌터와 함께 대한민국 하늘을 지킬 준비 되셨나요? # 에어헌터의 특징 # ▶ Full 3D 기반의 화려한 그래픽 고해상도로 구현된 실사 같은 배경 속에 펼쳐지는 다양한 적기 및 거대 보스와의 일전 눈이 부실 정도로 화려한 탄막이 빚어내는 최고의 그래픽을 맘껏 즐겨보세요! ▶ 모두가 기다려 온 정통슈팅 게임의 재미 거대한 보스와 함께 쏟아지는 탄막을 아슬아슬하게 피하며 발사하는 공격력 2배의 리스크샷의 짜릿한 쾌감! 전투도 전략이다! 적의 약점을 공략해야 하는 파츠 파괴시스템! 보스 격추 후 마음껏 창공을 누비는 짜릿한 하이퍼 모드! 손가락 하나로 느낄 수 있는 슈팅게임의 극한 쾌감을 경험하세요! ▶ 성장을 넘어선 기체성장 시스템! 조종사의 선택에 따라 변화하고 성장하는 기체강화!!! 외형은 물론 공격형태와 고유한 특성 또한 진화한다! 이제 성장을 넘어서는 진화의 재미를 느껴보세요! ▶ 더 이상 외롭지 않다! 경쟁을 넘어 선 혁신! 상상초월 편대전투! 이제 더 이상 혼자 외롭게 싸우지 마세요! 마음 맞는 친구, 동료들과 함께 결성하는 카카오 최초 편대비행 시스템! ________________________________________ ※ 유료 콘텐츠(아이템) 구매 시 별도의 요금이 부과됩니다. ● 청약 철회 및 구매 대금의 환불 등 - 이용자가 구매한 유료콘텐츠의 경우에는 계약 체결일 또는 유료콘텐츠 이용가능일로부터 7일 이내에 별도의 수수료 없이 청약철회(구매취소)를 할 수 있습니다. 단, 선물 및 이벤트 등 회사나 제3자로부터 무상으로 제공받은 유료콘텐츠, 청약철회 요청 당시 이미 사용하였거나 사용한 것으로 간주되는 유료콘텐츠 등 이에 준하는 특성을 가진 일부 유료콘텐츠에 대하여는 관련 법령에 따라 청약철회(구매취소)가 제한될 수 있습니다. ● 청약 철회에 따른 효과 - 회사는 이용자로부터 재화 등을 반환 받은 경우 3영업일 이내에 대금을 환급합니다 단, 수납확인이 필요한 결제수단의 경우에는 수납확인일로부터 3영업일 이내에 이를 환급하도록 합니다. 이 경우 회사가 환급을 지연한 때에는 그 지연기간에 대하여 관련 법령에서 정한 이율을 곱하여 산정한 지연이자를 지급합니다. ● 미성년자 결제에 대한 조항 - 애플리케이션에서 판매되는 유료콘텐츠를 미성년자가 법정대리인의 동의 없이 결제한 경우, 미성년자 또는 법정대리인은 결제를 취소할 수 있습니다. 단, 미성년자의 유료콘텐츠 결제가 법정대리인으로부터 처분을 허락 받은 재산의 범위 내인 경우 또는 미성년자가 사술 등을 사용하여 성년자로 믿게 한 때에는 취소가 제한됩니다. 유료콘텐츠 구매자가 미성년자인지 여부는 결제가 진행된 단말기 또는 신용카드 등 결제수단의 명의자를 기준으로 판단됩니다. 미성년자 결제취소를 요청하시는 경우 회사의 필요에 따라 미성년자 및 법정대리인을 증명할 수 있는 서류를 제출하여야 합니다. ________________________________________ ** 함께하는 재미를 전달하는 모바일 게임 브랜드 위미(weme)와 함께 하세요! ** ** FAQ로 찾아보고, 서로서로 묻고 답하고, 1:1문의로 물어보고! Call History Manager keep up to past 1000 days call logs and list them category wise for ease of access. Quick and advanced search options helps you to easily access data you are looking for. There are many other features included to manage your call logs easily and efficiently. Statistics: Improved statistics screen. Backup & Restore: Call History Manager provides option to backup call history so that you can restore it later. This will be useful if you had to reset phone for some reasons. Export to excel: Call History Manager allows you to export call logs to excel format. Contact Details: User can tap on any of the call log to see contact details of a specific contact. You can also see the statistics of calls made between that contact. Add Fake Call: Call History Manager Allows you to insert a fake call log. Auto Delete Call Log: This feature allows you to automatically delete call logs from a particular number right after you hung up phone. If you have something to hide, this option is for you. Your feedback mails are much appreciated. Please send us bug report or new feature requests to passionateandroiden@gmail.com .

description: This app is not just another Psalms bible quote app for listing quotes from bible. Our aim is to keep you inspired and nourished everyday. So we don't list quotes to read all at a time, the App will show one new quote each day. You will be notified in the morning with the quote. Start your day with an Inspiring Psalms Bible verse! Daily Psalms Bible verses (DPBV ) and devotions are the best way to start a day. Best Apps World is here with daily Psalms Bible quotes app where you will get Psalms Bible verses for every problem. Through this Psalms Bible verses free app, you will get Psalms Bible verses for every day. In this daily Psalms Bible verse we carefully choose Psalms Bible verses for women, Psalms Bible verses for kids, Psalms Bible verses for couples and Psalms Bible verses for everyday life. So this daily Psalm Bible devotion app will be the best Psalms bible app free that you will get for your Android mobile phones. We collected these daily Psalms Bible quotes from The Holy Bible New King James version NKJV and The Holy Bible New International Version NIV free download. So daily in the morning you will get New Testament Bible free quotes and Old Testament Bible Free. This Daily devotional Bible app can be used for youthful praise or as youth ministry resources, because we gave the best Bible gateway for Youth. This is also used as the best devotionals for women. Daily Psalms Bible Verse app delivers you with enlightening Psalms bible verses daily. There is no big list of Psalms bible verses to confuse you. DPBV shows you just one Psalms bible verse daily. Our specially chosen daily Psalms bible verses helps you to start your day thinking about and thanking God for this wonderful life .It will also set you think deeply about each quote, understand its right meaning and act wisely upon so as to bring happiness upon on yourself and your fellow beings. Features:- * Daily notification in the morning. * Highly curated inspirational quotes from bible. * Option to make quotes as favourite for future reference. * Share quotes with friends/family as text quote/image. * Download the quote to camera roll to set as wallpaper. * Facebook, Twitter, email, text(SMS) etc sharing. * If you want to see the daily verse in future, set it as favourite by clicking the love symbol and it will be available in the Favourites tab. Use of this Psalms Bible verse of the day app. Versers are choose from popular versions like the NIV, NASB, ESV, NKJV, NLT, KJV, The Message, and more. So it will help you to know how Jesus calling you. These Jesus prayer are a powerful tool to know that. Hundreds of reading plans: Devotionals, old testament stories, topical plans, old testament Bible tagalog, portions of the Bible, or the whole thing. You’ll find devotionals, as well as plans that lead you through specific topics, Psalms youth Bible verses, Psalms portions of the Bible, Bible trivia or even the entire Bible. SUGGESTIONS WELCOME! We want to make this the most inspirational and useful app we can. Please send us your ideas to make it better! ISSUES? Please email us with the details so that we can take care of it.Any people from United States of America (USA / US), Canada, Australia, United Kingdom ( UK / England ), Germany and people from all other english speaking country can use this app.Successfully tested on mobile phone devices like Samsung galaxy, Samsung S4, Samsung S3 , Sony xperia , HTC series,and LG Optimus,Nexus etc

★ 미티영 : 미국TV로 배우는 영어회화는 ★ 미국TV 방송 대사를 한줄씩 읽기, 쓰기, 듣기 학습하는 영어앱입니다. 5분 길이의 방송을 30분 정도 학습하면 자막없이 영상을 보실 수 있을 정도로 탁월한 학습 효과를 갖고 있습니다. 미티영이라고 불러주세요. ★ 미국TV로 영어를 배운다구요? ★ - 미국의 리얼 버라이어티 방송 대사를 그대로 공부합니다. - 이해하기 쉽게 한줄씩 자막과 번역, 발음을 제공합니다. - 한 단원이 끝나면 자막없이 바로 미국 방송을 볼수 있습니다. - 일반 회화용 방송과 직장인 영어용 방송등 공부에 적합한 방송을 제공합니다. ★ 매일 30분간 무료입니다 ★ 기능 제한없이 매일 30분간 무료로 모든 콘텐츠를 이용하실 수 있습니다. == 하루 1시간으로 리스닝 끝내는 법 == 1. 스토어에서 관심있는 방송을 다운 받고 2. 읽기, 쓰기, 듣기 순으로 공부하고 3. 동영상을 보면서 영어가 들리는 기쁨으로 하루를 마무리하면 됩니다. == 주요 기능 == ▶ 읽기 - 영어, 한국어를 번갈아 보며 의미를 이해 - 영어 발음 듣고 따라하기 - 모르는 단어는 터치해서 검색 - 관심있는 문장을 스크랩해서 모아 보기 ▶ 쓰기 - 한국 발음을 듣고 문장을 조합하며 암기 ▶ 듣기 - 한줄씩 영어를 듣고 따라하며 발음 연습 - 백그라운드 재생 지원 ▶ 동영상 보기 - 미국 TV 보며 실제 발음, 억양 복습하기 - 재생 속도 조절 - 자막 단위 재생 - ▶ 단어퀴즈 - 주요 단어의 뜻, 철자 맞추기 퀴즈 ▶ 학습 시간 관리 - 날짜별, 종류별 학습 시간 정리 == 페이스북 == 페이스북 좋아요를 등록하시면 더욱 편리하게 최근 소식을 받아 보실 수 있습니다. https://www.facebook.com/esltvcast == 무통장입금 == 신용카드 결제가 어려우신 분들은 070-8677-2680 이나 byungchol.kim@tvlango.com 으로 연락 주시면 무통장 입금 계좌를 알려드립니다. == 연관키워드 == 영어,영어회화,영어공부, 미티영, 미국TV로 배우는 영어, 미국TV로 배우는 영어회화 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 070-8677-2680

The application is used for quick orientation in E Numbers/Food Additives that after viewing the result provides a basic overview of features that make them easy to recognize whether a substance is dangerous to health. The database currently contains more than 500 entries. E Numbers/Food Additives are used for many reasons: - To extend the shelf life - Protection from destruction - Improve the taste, appearance and smell - Create the impression of a high content of fruit, eggs, butter, natural juices, etc. Unfortunately it is not easy at first look to determine which substance is safe and which are not. Not all E Numbers/Food Additives are dangerous; even there are some health benefits (for example vitamins). This application will help you to understand, if food additive is safe. ★ What can be expected • Application searches E Numbers/Food Additives and displays their basic properties (harmfulness, suitable for vegetarians, suitable for sensitive persons, suitability for children, the source of the substance was / was not genetically modified) • The application is available for free and without ads (target is not profit, but protect your health) • The application is offline (no Internet connection required to display desired information) ★ What can not be expected • The current application does not include a detailed description of E Numbers/Food Additives

Change your smartphone into a powerful QR Code, Barcode, and Data Matrix scanning utility. Import, create, use, and share data in a matter of taps. This intuitive, full-featured and multi-language QR utility will change the way you interact with QR Codes and their smart actions and activities. Get the app PCWorld and Android Magazine awarded 5 out of 5 Stars. QR Droid allows you to digitally share just about anything. COST-FREE and AD-FREE. THE LATEST VERSION’S FEATURES INCLUDE: - A tap on the Menu button acts as a Home button to bring you to the top of the menu tree. - Intuitive, more aesthetically pleasing UI added to My Profile in Zapper Technologies™. - Updated privacy, menu and settings allow you more control over Zapper Technologies. - Sort and group your history to help you quickly access your most-used QR Codes. - Amazon Store location bug fixed to ensure relevant store will appear wherever you are. - Zapper™ Profile – complete your profile once to seamlessly register, login and pay at participating websites using your Zapper profile (powered by QR Droid’s own Zapper Technologies). ALL FEATURES QR Droid is true to its roots: a first class scanner. All the features you would expect to have, and more, are right here! - Create a code from a contact or bookmark and let a friend scan it to their device – no typing needed! - Scan retail items, compare prices, read product reviews, and buy with a "zap" of your phone. - Map where you are and where you're going to, share it with friends, colleagues and family. - Benefit from discounts and special offers by scanning barcodes on coupons and vouchers. - Scan a QR Code on a subway wall or from a catalog and have an item delivered directly to your doorstep. - View websites and movie clips while you're out and about. - Scan a QR Code in a magazine and watch a video immediately. - Scan QR Codes from your camera, browser, SD card, or saved image. - Create and share QR Codes in less than a second from maps, contacts, bookmarks, installed apps & more - 'Inbox' and 'Feedback' options. Receive important updates & give feedback directly to QR Droid’s support team using the in-app messaging system. - Create XQR Codes for massive ‘Plain Text’ and ‘Contact’ QR Codes. - USSD codes are never opened automatically, preventing remote wipe attacks of your device. - Add QR Droid Widgets free to help you get the most from QR Droid. Install a widget on your Android homepage to take you directly into the specific part of the app you use most: create business cards, history, bookmarks and others. Download QR Droid Widgets at http://0.qr.ai or use the pre-installed widgets in the QR Droid app. - Zap a QR Code to gain access to private WiFi networks. description: *The Game* Mages arrive! Apprentices from the famed Temple  have graduated and will now aid players with their amazing abilities! From the makers of your favourite Magic Temple game, here comes the highly anticipated sequel- Magic Temple 2 : Mage Wars! Magic Temple lies in the fantastic world of the ancient elements - Earth, Fire and Ice. Only by mastering them all can you be called a true mage worthy of being a Guardian in the Magic Temple Hall of Fame. As a young mage, your objective is to Tap & Match gems to increase the power of that particular element and finally unlock their magical essence. You have 60 seconds to show the world your magic! Looking for that perfect photo editing app? Look no further! ModiFace Photo Editor is the most intuitive one-stop photo makeover tool for all of your photo editing needs. With a variety of instant looks to choose from in combination with other powerful photo editing essentials, it's impossible to achieve anything other than a perfect result! ModiFace Photo Editor features our state-of-the-art cosmetics/makeup simulation, as well as skin and facial enhancement effects. Other great features include blemish removal, teeth whitening, color contacts, facial/body slimming, and even warping. To finalize your photo, you can crop, add filter, frame, and text, and instantly share your polished result with your friends and family! ModiFace Photo Editor has many editing tools for you to add a professional touch on your photos. And it is completely FREE. Try it out today and let us know what you think! ================ FEATURES ================ ★★★ Basics ★★★ ✔ Brightness and contrast adjustments ✔ Sharpening and blurring ✔ Image cropping ★★★ Facial and Beauty★★★ ✔ Blemish removal (magic touch ♥) ✔ Color contact try-ons ✔ Makeup/Costemic try-ons ✔ Teeth whitening ✔ Enlarge eyes ✔ Brighten eyes ✔ Nose and jaw contour enhancements ✔ Smoothen skin ★★★ Advanced ★★★ ✔ Instant looks ✔ Face slimming visualization ✔ Body slimming visualization ✔ Warping - expand, pinch, twirl or spin, drag ✔ Image filters ✔ Frames ✔ Text Insertion ★★★ Others ★★★ ✔ Download and upload images from Facebook ✔ Face detection for the ease of apply facial effects ✔ Before and After comparison ================ QUICK FAQ ================ Q. Where are the photos saved to? A. Saved photos can be found in ModiFace folder here: /mnt/sdcard/Pictures/ModiFace/. Q. Face detection seems off, why? A. In order to have an accurate face detection, you have to be connected to the internet. Q. Teeth whiten option is disabled, why? A. This option is not available when the app thinks your mouth is closed. Go to adjust mode (photo >> adjust) and follow the on-screen instruction to adjust the face points if needed. When prompted “Is the mouth open in the photo?”, click “Yes”. Further adjust inner mouth points and click “next”. Teeth whiten option should be enabled now. Q. Many options (looks, makeup, blemish, etc.) are disabled, why? A. These options are not available when your cropped image does not contain the entire face. ✔ Support: Android 2.2 (Froyo) and up ✔ Publisher: ModiFace - the Virtual Makeover experts

description: Stream Sensor Data From Your Phone To A PC Or A Classroom Of PC’s Before you download this app! SensorScope requires a program downloaded to a Windows PC. This program “SensorScope.exe” is free and available for download on our website at www.pinkleopardsoftware.com. While there, check out our other exciting professional products available through the Play Store. SensorScope allows you to view output from your Android devices’ sensors on a PC over Wi-Fi. It gives you a real-time view of the internal workings of your phone. A developers dream come true. SensorScope streams data on your Wi-Fi network to every computer connected to your access point. The information streamed by SensorScope will not route. As an example, If you’re at Starbucks and start SensorScope, the data will be available to every PC in the coffee shop (I’m sure they would find it utterly fascinating!) but people in a Starbucks across the street will not be able to receive it. The program on the PC is free making it ideal for teaching Android Programming or Physics. SensorScope was developed as a programming tool for our in-house staff and is now being released to the general public. There is no setup involved. Start the Windows and Android program and SensorScope takes care of all the details. It's a perfect tool for the classroom.

Venez découvrir l’histoire du sentier historique Luchon-Bénasque dans les Pyrénées au pied de l'Aneto grâce au multiguide Route 3404. Il saura retenir votre attention grâce aux diverses thématiques abordées à la fois culturelles, naturalistes, géologiques, économiques et historiques. Traitées à travers des textes audio, des interviews d’habitants et de spécialistes ainsi que des animations, elles s’adressent aux plus grands comme aux plus jeunes. En passant au-dessus des thermes de Luchon, arrêtez vous un instant pour écouter l’interview du Dr.Lussac nous relatant l’histoire de ces bâtiments et les bienfaits de ses eaux. Découvrez l’histoire des premiers pyrénéistes, des réfugiés espagnols et bien d‘ autres éléments marquants de l’histoire culturelle de ce sentier. Trois itinéraires sont disponibles, de niveaux différents : familial, randonneur confirmé et sportif. Fonctions : Itinéraires : Choisir un des itinéraires disponibles, les étapes se déclenchent automatiquement par GPS et donnent accès à un contenu multimédia Carte : repérer sa position, voir les itinéraires, les étapes Découvrir : Visiter des sites remarquables autour de Bagnères-de-Luchon Info pratiques : Avoir des informations sur la météo, les conseils pour randonnées en montagne, contact avec l'office de tourisme Il est recommandé d'utiliser l'application sur les lieux des itinéraires pour avoir une expérience réussie. Le contenu de l'application est totalement téléchargé : Poids total : 212Mo Carte : 3Mo Contenu multimédia : 209Mo Cela permet de copier le contenu sur la carte SD de votre terminal et d'accéder à l'application et au contenu sans connexion internet. Préférez un téléchargement via Wifi. Application Route3404 - Route 3404, design,développement et CMS par Camineo. Discover the history of the historic trail Bénasque-Luchon in the Pyrenees at the foot of the Route multiguide Aneto through 3404. He will hold your attention through the various topics addressed both cultural, nature, geological, economic and historical. Processed through audio texts, interviews with residents and specialists as well as entertainment, they cater to larger as the youngest. Passing above the Baths of Luchon, stop for a moment to listen to the interview Dr.Lussac telling us the history of these buildings and the benefits of its waters. Discover the history of the first pyrénéistes, Spanish refugees and many other highlights of the cultural history of this trail. Three routes are available on several levels: family, sports and confirmed hiker. Functions: Itineraries: Choose one of the available routes, steps are triggered automatically by GPS and provide access to multimedia content Map: locate its position, see itineraries, steps Discover: Visit the remarkable sites around Bagneres-de-Luchon Practical information: Getting information about weather, tips for hiking, contact the tourist office It is recommended to use the application on site routes to have a successful experience. The content of the application is completely downloaded: Total weight: 212Mo Map: 3MB Multimedia content: 209Mo This copies the contents of the SD card from your device and access the application and content without an internet connection. Prefer a download via WiFi. Application Route3404 - Route 3404, design, development and CMS by Camineo.

Welcome to the Skin Care Surgery Doctor Hospital, the best skin care surgery hospital in town for skin diseases, ankle, leg, foot and shoulder surgery, the doctor and plastic surgery games have never been so amazing. This Skin Care Surgery Doctor game is the especially designed for kids to give them the chance to become a Skin surgeon and treat the injured patients in their clinic hospital with the help of nurse using different tools. Recently, there are few skin patients brought to the hospital in ambulance for surgery. The ambulance doctor has tried it’s best to keep the injured patients calm and gave them the first aid. The first aid given by the ambulance doctor has saved the injured patients from severe pain and further damage to skin infection. The nurse is preparing the operation theatre for the surgery of the injury. Take tests of the patients and use X-rays of foot to find internal skin diseases. Fix the skin infections, kill the germs with antiseptics and stitch the wounds and use the magical healers on damaged skin to heal the injury. This is the best of all surgery games. If you like doctor hospital nurse care games and plastic surgery games, this game is definitely for you. Want to ace your Florida real estate exam? Look no further! This Upward Mobility app for Android contains 433 questions covering essential vocabulary and state exam specific knowledge. Each question is paired with a concise but detailed explanation to ensure comprehension. Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues. This app contains 200 questions specific to content on the Florida state real estate exam, and 233 questions of key Real Estate vocabulary, each written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert real estate writers. The questions cover all important topics on the Florida broker exam, including: Legal Aspects, Encumbrances, Real Estate Law, Financing Escrow, Contracts, Taxation, Subdivision, Business Opportunities, Land Descriptions, Appraisal, and Vocabulary. This app is not affiliated with the Florida Department of Business & Professional Regulation. Our apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion in both an aggregate and a question-by-question format. About Upward Mobility Upward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you. We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

This is an Ad-free version of Trigonometry Quick Reference Guide Please consider purchasing the app to support the developers. Trigonometry Quick reference Pro guide has all the important formulas and concepts covered to help the student review them on regular basis. Topics include: a) Definitions - Right Triangle Definition and Unit Triangle definition b) Facts and properties of trigonometric functions i.e., Domain, Range and period c) Formulas and Identities (includes Tangent and Cotangent Identities, Reciprocal Identities, Pythagorean Identities, Even/Odd Formulas, Periodic formulas, Double Angle formulas, Degree to radian formulas, Half-angle formulas, Sum and Difference formulas, Product to sum formulas, Sum to product formulas, and Co Function Formulas) d) Unit circle explained e) Inverse Trigonometric functions and its properties f) Law of sines, Cosines and tangents which are define the relationship between the angles of a triangle and its sides.

description: You’re on the path to something big — Evernote is where you do the work to achieve it. Write notes of all types, from short lists to lengthy research, and access them on any device. Collect web articles, handwritten notes, and photos to keep all the details in one place. Find your work quickly with Evernote’s powerful search. Move projects forward with Evernote: - Take notes: write in a clean, distraction-free workspace. - Get organized: create notebooks and add tags to wrangle projects. - Access anywhere: keep your work in sync across devices. - Find anything fast: text in notes, photos, and PDFs is searchable. - Share ideas and resources: create a workspace for collaboration with shared notebooks. - Keep up with to-do’s: make to-do lists and check items off as you go. - Harness creativity: capture ideas while they’re fresh, wherever you are. - Prepare for meetings: draft agendas and to-do’s for next time. - Manage expenses: organize receipts, bills, and invoices to keep expense reports in check. - Plan business travel: save reservations and tickets for simple trip planning. Accomplish even more with Evernote Premium: ★Take notebooks offline to access them anytime ★ Add a PIN lock to the Evernote app on your phone ★Notes are four times larger so you can pack Evernote with large files and hi-res images Evernote is available for all your computers, phones, tablets, and on the web! Find your notes anywhere you’ve installed the app. ★ New York Times ‘Top 10 Must-Have App’, Winner: TechCrunch Crunchies, Mashable Awards and the Webbys. ★ Want to use Evernote with your team at work? Learn more about Evernote Business at: http://evernote.com/business/ Visit our homepage: http://www.evernote.com/ More information about permissions at: http://evernote.com/privacy/data_usage.php

Even Better Password Maker (EBPM) creates an unique password for each website. You supply a "master password" and the URL of a website. EBPM then generates an unique password for that website. App *NEVER* accesses the internet (check permissions if worried) and does not store any secret on disk. Compatible with other applications based on Passwordmaker ( http://passwordmaker.org ) namely the google-chrome and firefox plugin. All code is open source under a Gnu GPL license at: https://github.com/joninvski/even_better_password_maker Any problems or sugestions/feedback please email: trindade.joao@gmail.com

description: Lame Castle is an intense auto-runner with beautifully hand-drawn art. description: Flexible Benefit Administrators Mobile is the new mobile app developed by Alegeus Technologies. Flexible Benefit Administrators Mobile provides a single access point for participants to manage their consumer driven healthcare and other tax favored benefit accounts. Flexible Benefit Administrators Mobile is a completely customizable, branded mobile application. Flexible Benefit Administrators Mobile shares user authentication with the WealthCare Portal, meaning that registered users can merely download the application and log in to immediately gain mobile access to their benefit accounts, with no need to register their mobile phone. Flexible Benefit Administrators Mobile provides the following functionality with its initial release: Detailed Account Information • Account balances and details • Recent Transactions and Details • Ability to fund HSA account from checking/savings account • View all email and SMS alerts • Contact administrator from mobile application via email or mobile phone • Same username /password as WealthCare Portal (no need to register your mobile device, just download, login, and go!) • Stronger Authentication support (Picture/Passphrase, device identification and Challenge questions)

Marble Vortex is a captivating live wallpaper featuring free-floating marbles caught in a ballet between two swirling vortexes. The marbles restlessly never stop and provide an entrancing, almost celestial, sequence of orbits and collisions. Marble Vortex is customizable. - Number of marbles - Vortex speed Increase the speed and number of marbles for a cacophony of high speed collisions between the marble projectiles. Alternatively, decrease the speed and number for soft dance between the orbiting marbles. Marble Vortex is supported by Andengine with physics support by Box2d.

app_name: まんがで読破 論語
description: 【著者名】バラエティ・アートワークス 【出版社名】イースト・プレス 【内容紹介】 儒教の始祖・孔子。「礼儀」や「思いやり」など現代の人々に忘れられつつある精神…。いま人類に必要な格言と思想を漫画化！ 2500年前から変わらない私たちの生きる指針！ 「過ぎたるはなお及ばざるが如し」「温故知新」などの言葉を残した儒教の始祖・孔子。誰もが一度は聞いたことのあるその格言は、2500年の時を超えて現代まで伝えられた孔子の魂だった。しかし、その言葉の中に息づく精神は、「礼儀」や「思いやり」など、現代の人々に忘れられつつあるものばかり……。いま人類にもっとも必要な格言とその思想を漫画化！ ★孔子（こうし） 紀元前551～紀元前479 中国春秋時代の魯の思想家で儒教の開祖。仁と礼とを倫理的行為の根本におく思想を掲げ、徳治政治を達成しようとしたが、当時の体制には聞き入れられず、国政に失望して弟子たちとともに諸国を遊説した。現在では聖人と謳われ、その思想はアジアをはじめ世界中に広く伝えられている。 【書籍価格】580円 【書籍ページ数】186ページ 【電子書籍版ページ数】191ページ 【ファイルサイズ】30.5Mbyte 【ファイル形式】イメージ形式 【目次】 智 信 礼 義 仁 ※注意事項 初回起動時に約30.5MBの書籍データをダウンロードします。 ・初回起動時はWi-Fi環境での起動を推奨します。 ※NTT docomoのスマートフォンをお使いで「NTT DOCOMO料金と一緒に支払い」にてアプリ購入するには、「SPモード決済」を「利用可能」にする必要があります。「ドコモショップ」または、ドコモの携帯電話から「151」、一般電話などから「0120-800-800」の後、メニュー番号2-2にてお手続きしてください。 こちらの書籍は電子書店アプリBookGate(ブックゲート)と連携してご利用いただけます。BookGateをダウンロードすれば、購入済みの書籍は自動的に本棚に登録されます。是非ご活用ください。 ※BookGateアプリは無料です。

description: After “Spectral Souls”, HyperDevbox strikes again with “Generation of Chaos”, a new 100-hour game experience. Build and govern your own kingdom. Engage in 30 vs 30 thrilling battles in real time to defend and expand your territory. Immerse yourself into each kingdom’s story and play as over 150 characters through 10 different campaigns. Story: The Dravanian revolution ended in 1701 leaving a nation in ruins. In the wake of this chaos, Minister Zeo deftly rose to emerge as Dravania’s new leader. Before long, Zeo began to transform Dravania into a powerful military force. Now, Dravania has risen from the ashes to restore peace and prosperity to the rest of Lost Grounds… - 3D Battle Scenes - A massive unique Strategy RPG for Android - Over 150 unique commanders - 10 different campaigns - Over 100 hours of gameplay - 30 vs 30 epic battles in real-time - Animated special attacks and spoken events - Two touch configurations (including a tablet mode) - Support for Touch & Keyboard with key mapping (Left Analog Stick click for SELECT BUTTON and Right Analog Stick Click for START BUTTON when using XBOX360 controller) ©2011-2015 IDEA FACTORY, developed for Android, licensed and published by HYPERDEVBOX .

“Where’s the turkey, Chuck?” This holiday season, join Charlie Brown and the Peanuts gang around the table for a (very!) unique Thanksgiving dinner. From pilgrims to popcorn, A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving comes to life in this beautifully re-mastered 40th anniversary edition. Magically marrying a book-like feel with clever interactive elements, A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving will leave your senses hungry for a second helping! Kick the football with Charlie Brown, prepare the meal with Master Chef Snoopy, and set the table with Woodstock as the gang discovers the true meaning of Thanksgiving. A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving captures the playful nature of this timeless TV classic through hundreds of living animations, illustrations and graphic elements. Make a new family tradition this holiday season – add A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving to your digital library today! App Features: • Featuring dialogue, music and sound effects from the original 1973 animated special. • All-new art style turns every page into a living illustration • Touch, tilt and slide your way through every page of the book! • Leaf collecting feature and instructional elements playfully guide little readers through the story. • “For Parents” area safely separates adult controls from child-friendly content. • Enhanced type and improved swipe tabs increase the applications readability across devices. • Engaging narration by Stephen Shea, the voice of Linus van Pelt. • Three reading modes are included for your enjoyment: Read to Me, Read Myself, and Autoplay. • Additional educational features include word highlighting and touch-to-speak technology.

app_name: パチンコ「ミニミニモンスター2」
description: あの興奮が蘇る！・・・「もっとドキドキ！」「もっとスピーディー！」を追求し、わかりやすいゲ－ム性で復活したパチンコ『ミニミニモンスター2』！新たな興奮を体感せよ！ ≪※注意事項≫ ・本アプリは縦画面専用となります。（横画面への切替はできません） ・本アプリは初回起動時に約30MBのリソースデータをダウンロードします。 ・本アプリをダウロードする場合、十分な保存領域があることをご確認の上、ダウンロードしてください。 ・本アプリは大容量通信を行うため、初回はWi-Fi環境でのアプリ起動を推奨します。 ・本アプリケーションはメモリを多く消費しますので、強制終了などが発生する場合には、端末の再起動やソフトウェアアップデートが最新に更新されている事をご確認ください。 ■アプリ紹介 パチンコ「ミニミニモンスター2」は遊びやすい甘デジスペック＆ライトミドルスペックで、全ての大当りで必ず出玉を獲得できるシンプルなパチンコ機種です。初代「CRモンスターハウス」のDNAをしっかりと継承し、先読み予告として復活を遂げた「ツルツル予告」やお馴染みのスーパーリーチ「おばけのっかりリーチ」「おばけつ かみリーチ」は、出現率と期待度のバランスが絶妙です。また、動けば超激アツの「巨大おばけ可動物」や回転時の光の色で信頼度を示唆する「流れ星可動物」 も前作から大幅にパワーアップ！ 新旧が融合したシンプルな予告や変わらないリーチアクションの数々が、多くのパチンコファンを魅了します。 実機の演出・楽曲・ボイスなど、細部に渡って忠実に再現されており、パチンコホールでプレイしているかのような臨場感をお楽しみいただけるパチンコ実機シミュレーターアプリです。 ≪プレイメニュー≫ 【シミュレーション】 大当り確率1/159.8の「LMZ」、大当り確率1/99.9の「N70Z」の2つのスペックを搭載し、それぞれ実践モード・練習モードをプレイすることができます。 【リーチ確認】 実践モードプレイ中に出現したリーチ演出を「リーチ鑑賞」で再現することができます。全部で14種類あるリーチ演出のコンプリートを目指してみてください。 【機種紹介】 実機2スペックの機種紹介をみることができます。 【遊び方】 本アプリのメニューやモードの説明、設定方法や操作方法について記載しています。 【DATA RESET】 プレイ中の中断した保存データ（SAVEデータ）や設定で変更したメニュー項目などの保存データなど、すべてのデータを初期化します。 (C)TAKEYA ＜対応機種＞ 下記のページを参照してください。 http://go.commseed.net/go/?pcd=term01 「ミニミニモンスター2」は、2010年9月に発売された株式会社竹屋製のパチンコで人気のモンスターシリーズを題材としたパチンコ(ぱちんこ)です。 【竹屋関連パチンコ(ぱちんこ)機種】 CRA ミニミニモンスター3 CR Mr Bean CR モンスターキャッスル CR モンスターパーティ CR KISSワールドツアー CRA ミニミニモンスター CR お江戸 de モンスター CR フリテンくん CR 三国覇王伝 CR モンスタービレッジ CR ベガス カジノ＆リゾート CR モンスターオーケストラ CR モンスターマンション CR モンスターハウス CR 一休さん CR どたばた空挺団 CR キャッツ CR ハムスターハウス CR 魔女っ子学園 CR お宝探検隊 CR 私がマコちゃん2 CR スーパージャンパー 【デベロッパーについて】 コムシード (英語: CommSeed Corporation) は、ぱちんこ・パチスロアプリの開発をはじめ、パチンコ・パチスロ向け情報コンテンツサービスや人気パチンコソーシャルゲームサービスの企画制作・運営等を行う企業です。 [検索用キーワード] パチンコ倶楽部　実機シミュレーターアプリ　パチスロ　北斗　エヴァ　マクロス　エウレカ　ガロ　銭形平次

Chess puzzles are an ideal way to practice without having to find an opponent or spend time playing an actual game. iChess presents 1000 offline puzzles from real FIDE tournament games. Just launch and start solving! iChess is now available on iPhone and iPad! http://goo.gl/1GIu67 ★★★★★ "Awesome app with hell lot of puzzles. Best one seen so far !!" ★★★★★ "Its a great and functional training tool" FEATURES ♟ Three difficulty levels. All puzzles are offline. No internet connection required ♟ Load your own PGN puzzle file. Chessbase CBH format not supported ♟ Hint and engine analysis with Stockfish and other engines! Or hide the Hint and avoid temptation! ♟ Bird View feature to view Solved/Failed and unseen puzzles. Or solve the difficult puzzles again! ♟ Scorecard to track your progress ♟ Mark a puzzle as favorite ♟ Master Chess openings by solving chess tactics from openings like Sicilian, Kings Indian etc (extra $) ♟ Solve puzzles from recent 2015 tournament chess games (extra $) ♟ New Material design! (thanks to Ilya Kostin) NOTE ♟ Some puzzles simply win a pawn or a piece and not necessarily end in checkmate ♟ Puzzles are arranged in increasing order of difficulty ♟ This is not an app to play chess online or play against the mobile or with friends ♟ Thanks to theweekinchess.com and pgnmentor.com for the PGN files Follow on Google Plus http://goo.gl/Axhm4 Like on Facebook http://goo.gl/P5TXe NOTE: 'Read Phone identity' is required to secure purchases. No private information can be accessed

description: Simple and easy to use world clock application & widget. If your location is missing, find a place in the same time zone & change the clock title: (1) Find another city/location in the same time zone, and add it. (2) Click on the new city and select "Edit Clock". (3) Rename the clock title & description and click on "OK". Features: * Customizable widget background. * Multiple clocks support. * Quick search for locations. * Displaying 12H or 24H clock format. * Optional display of date

Customize your photos with our stamper tool! Several stamps to choose from for all occasions. Just select the stamp you want and touch the screen to start drawing with it. Drawing Sketch Pad Coloring Book Features • Select from a pallet of 16 million possible colors • Drawing Stamper Feature • • Smileys • • Roses • • Love Hearts • • TARDIS • • Dalek • • Many more.. • Toggle between both cameras (Android 2.3 and higher) • Change Camera to monochrome or color mode (When Supported by your Phone) • Draw as precisely as you like with brush widths down to 1px • Paint bucket allows you to fill in open spaces or coloring book pages • Share your Pictures on Facebook and Email • Erase the last 5 steps in your drawing • Clear Screen Option • Coloring Book Pages • Save Pictures to SD Card in DoodleMirror folder • Load any picture you have ever taken and draw on it • Frame your Pictures, Coloring Book Pages, and Artwork • Set your artwork as the wallpaper on your device • • Available Frames Are: • • • Kids and Animals • • • Red Flowers • • • Happy Birthday • • • Lovers Hearts • • • St. Patrick's Day • • • Easter • • • Easter Egg • • • Golden • • • Button to Remove the Ads for $0.99 Especially for Dr Who fans there is now a TARDIS and DALEK stamper that you can draw with! Put the TARDIS in the middle of your living room with a DALEK waiting outside and share your picture on Facebook! • If you like using our app, please pay to upgrade so we can continue to improve and expand Sketch Pad Coloring Book NOTE: Camera Features are only available on devices with Android 2.3 and up We are proud to announce that we have just added FREE COLORING BOOK pages and a PAINT BUCKET feature to Drawing Sketch Pad Coloring Book these features were formerly available only in the Pro version of Drawing Sketch Pad Coloring Book, Sketch Pad Pro. Sketch on your phone or tablet for Free! Color on Free Coloring Book Pages! Use your android phone or tablet as a Sketch pad, Drawing pad, or Coloring Book with your photo as the background, or just draw on a black background. Now you can FRAME YOUR PICTURES and Live Camera images If you don't see the "Frame" button, try scrolling the menu. As always you can share and save your Coloring Book Pages, Sketch pad pictures and drawings, now you can also draw on the entire surface of the screen (except where the ad space is.. Click the Ad Free button to remove the ads. Pick your color and start doodling. If you want to clear your picture and start over just tap the clear drawing icon. It can't get any easier than that. This is better than crayons and a coloring book to keep your kids entertained while waiting at a restaurant. Draw, Doodle and Sketch on your screen with Sketch Pad Coloring Book and share your drawings and Coloring Book Pages with your friends on Facebook or Email I hope you enjoy drawing with Doodle Mirror as much as I have. It really is just a lot of fun to draw on the Camera. This app turns on the front facing Camera and allows you to draw on top of it with your finger. If you have friends who like to Draw, Doodle, or Fingerpaint you can share Doodle Mirror with them right from the menu. Mind Trick Software hopes you enjoy drawing and finger painting with Sketch Pad / Drawing Mirror Doodle Mirror! The Camera / Mirror feature is only available on Android version 2.3 or higher, but you can still sketch away on a black background if you are running 2.2) In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating search monetization into our application. This will add search points to your device (hence the permissions) - which are easy and quick to remove or replace. Thank you!

description: Welcome to the dazzling future of Tower Building!! Tower Bloxx Revolution, is a sequel to the world wide smash hit series of Tower Bloxx, now with a revolutionary gameplay experience! Enter the fabulous - futuristic world of Sky City – 2699 and go beyond limits in building the most colorful and wacky sky scrapping Towers ever! Experience 3 fun filled games in one game, in a sci-fi world beyond! Build colorful towers to house the space toons, gain color combos and cool power ups that boost the speed of tower building, beat all your opponents and top the charts as the Richest Architect ever! 3 dazzling & engaging NEW games in one: Casual Game – how Rich can you get? Swift Game – how many Towers can you build, before the Time runs out? Frenzy Game – how quickly can you Align all the blocks? An ultimate test of Reflexes & Speed! Intuitive and Simple one touch/button gameplay. Amazing visuals of the Future - year 2699. Active Leaderboard system, wherein each opponent competes with each other and with the Player in every game session, keeping the pace always active. Over 10 cool Power ups such as Booster, Auto Align, Magnet, Freeze and a lot more. New “Super Combo Session” that engages the player with cash and height reward in Casual game mode. New & Never before experienced mini-game “Try Your Luck!” which is a luck based card picking game that rewards you with cool Bonuses. New Record system, that holds statistics and information of every single achievement of the Player inducing the drive to achieve more! New Tower Review system records your tower design, color, structure and displays it at the end of the game session for you to review and hone your performance further. The Award-winning gameplay of Tower Bloxx(TM) now comes with many times more fun!

description: Peel Smart Remote revolutionizes your home entertainment experience by integrating universal device control and live TV content discovery into one simple-to-use application. This remote changes everything! With Peel Smart Remote you can: - Control your TV, set-top box, DVD player, Blu-ray, Roku, Apple TV, audio system and more using the built-in IR blaster on your smartphone. - Enjoy personalized show,movie and sports recommendations based on your preferences - Set reminders to watch a show later or program your DVR - Select your favorite shows so you never miss an episode - Customize your channels to match your cable or dish package No more worrying about what to watch, how to find your favorite content, or where your remote is hiding. Peel controls thousands of brands of electronic devices and has accurate TV guide listings localized for 110 countries, customized to your over-the-air, cable or dish provider. Peel is the world’s most popular smart remote with 100 million-plus activated users worldwide and more than 8 billion smart remote commands a month. The more you tune-in with Peel, the smarter it gets. Add your top shows and channels to your “Favorites” page to make them even easier to find. We are constantly working to improve our app so you have the best television experience possible. If you are having trouble with TV listings or setting up the Peel remote on a particular device, please contact help@peel.com directly rather than post the problem in a review. This will allow us to help you most quickly and effectively and solve the problem for others in our community. Visit www.peel.com, or follow us on Twitter (@peeltv) and Facebook (facebook.com/peeltv) for the latest app updates.

description: Es una organización de accesos directos a aplicaciones y webs útiles para consulta habitual en el mundo aeronáutico. Consulta de: -- Todo tipo de información meteorológica relacionada con la aviación. METAR, TAFOR, GRAMET, pronósticos, mapas... -- NOTAM,s y TFR,s de cualquier aeródromo o zona mundial, en texto y REPRESENTADOS EN UN MAPA -- Cálculo de un plan de vuelo entre aeródromos, con mapas, distancias, tiempos según la velocidad de la aeronave, perfil de altitud... REPRESENTADO EN UN MAPA --Mapas aeronáuticos VFR, IFR low e IFR high de todo el mundo con cálculos de ruta y METAR/TAF de aeródromos. --Consulta de AIP España --Consulta de RCA España --Consulta de coordenadas de cualquier lugar y cambio entre formatos de coordenadas --Extras: calendario con días festivos en España y noticias aeronáuticas (RSS) Is an organization of shortcuts to applications and websites useful for regular consultation in the aeronautical world. Consultation: - All kinds of information related to aviation weather. METAR, TAFOR, Gramet, forecasts, maps ... - NOTAM, TFR s, s of any aerodrome or global area, in text and SHOWN ON A MAP - Calculation of a flight plan between airfields, with maps, distances, times, depending on the speed of the aircraft, altitude profile ... PICTURED ON A MAP - Aeronautical maps VFR, IFR and IFR low high worldwide with route calculations and METAR / TAF Aerodrome. - Consultation AIP Spain - Consultation RCA Spain - Check anywhere coordinate and coordinate exchange formats - Extras: calendar holidays in Spain and aviation news (RSS)
release_text: -- Compatible tabletas altas resoluciones -- Nueva pestaña "Airport info": información general de aeródromos: METAR/TAF, NOTAMS, situación en mapa, frecuencias, pistas...) Para buscar aeródromos basta con poner la ciudad o el indicativo OACI. -- Nuevas fuentes de noticias aeronáuticas en español e inglés. -- Cambiado mapa Google por "Sky Planning": vista de mapas VFR y cartas IFR de todo el mundo, con cálculo de rutas de vuelo (distancia, rumbo, tiempo según GS) y vista de METAR/TAF en el mapa.

This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. Caution: Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged.

В этом приложении в доступной форме описаны многие упражнения для развития мускулатуры. Каждое упражнение проиллюстрировано подробным рисунком, позволяющим наглядно представить задействованные группы мышц. Все рисунки сопровождаются необходимыми объяснениями, позволяющими как новичку, так и опытному спортсмену правильно построить план тренировки. Приложение является универсальным пособием как для любителей силовых занятий, так и для опытных практикующих специалистов. Практическое использование данного приложения позволит достичь прочных навыков корректного выполнения основных типов силовых упражнений, даст стабильный эстетический результат, который не исчезнет из-за временного прекращения тренировочного режима. ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ: - теперь есть возможность создавать неограниченное количество тренировок; - упражнения разделены на группы; - можно создавать суперсеты в группе; - упражнения кликабельны для быстрого просмотра; - упражнения и суперсеты можно сортировать в группе; - количество подходов увеличено до 99; - к упражнениям можно добавлять комментарий; - есть автозавершение текста при вводе названия упражнения; - свои названия упражнений сохраняются; - больше картинок и больше описания. - картинки можно зуммировать и перемещать движениями пальцев! - создание резервной копии в сервисе Dropbox и изменении ее на пк; - наипростейший секундомер; - просмотр истории изменения упражнения: - добавление своих упражнений с картинками. In this application, in an accessible way described many exercises to develop muscles. Each exercise is illustrated by the detailed pattern, allowing to visualize the involved muscle groups. All figures are accompanied by the necessary explanations, allowing both novice and experienced athletes to properly build up your workout. The app is a universal tool for both amateur force training, and experienced practitioners. The practical use of this application will achieve strong skills correctly perform basic types of strength training, will give stable aesthetic result, which will not disappear because of the temporary suspension of a training regime. FEATURES: - It is now possible to create an unlimited amount of training; - Exercises are divided into groups; - You can create supersets in the group; - Exercise clickable for quick viewing; - Exercises and supersets can be sorted in the group; - Number of sets increased to 99; - To exercise, you can add a comment; - Have autocomplete text as you type the name of the exercise; - Exercise their names are preserved; - More pictures and more descriptions. - Pictures can zoom and move with your fingers! - Create a backup when Dropbox and change it on the PC; - The simplest stopwatch; - View the history of changes in the exercise: - Add your exercises with pictures.

NOTE on 0.3.2: Sony device owners, please note that due to Sony's special hardware configuration, the Sleipnir Vaavud device will not work with your phone, and inserting the Sleipnir wind meter may cause the app to crash Turn your phone into a high-tech meteorological tool with the Vaavud app and the Vaavud wind meter. No more looking-at-the-trees-and-waves guesswork. Make a precise measurement of the wind no matter where you are and what you are up to. If you are into sailing, windsurfing, kite surfing, kite boarding, land yachting, balloon flying, paragliding, hunting, kite flying, kayaking, drone flying, hiking, golf, biking, etc., etc. - Or if you are just plain curious about the weather around you - then Vaavud is for you! The app requires the Vaavud wind meter for smartphones, which can be bought on Vaavud.com. The Vaavud wind meter is a patent pending, electronicless cup anemometer, which utilizes the sensors in your phone, and an advanced set of algorithms to measure the exact wind speed. Current features include: • Current, average, maximum wind speed and wind direction ( only with Sleipnir device). • Graph with current and average wind speed • Ability to scroll and zoom on the graph • Ability to choose unit (m/s, knots, mph, km/h, bft) • Wind range: 2- 25 m/s • Resolution: 0.1 m/s • Accuracy: +/- 4% or +/- 0.25 m/s • Live map of wind measurements • Measurement history Send us a note on hello@vaavud.com with any questions or comments you may have. We would love to hear from you!
release_text: 0.3.3.0 - Support functionality if Sleipnir calibration is not working. 0.3.2.6 - Improved audio configuration - Improved Sleipnir algorithm - Map icons optimization - Bug fixes 0.3.2.4 - No compass detection. - Calibration message will only appear the first time you plug Sleipnir 0.3.2.3 - Calibration issues fixed. - History sync wind direction icon issue fixed. 0.3.2.2 - Database upgrade fixed - Wind direction history sync fixed.

The application runs whenever you're driving. Even if the phone is in your pocket! eZWay independently analyzes the condition of the vehicle, automatically storing the information on car's personal web page. No permanent internet on your phone? - Not a problem, eZWay able to work via wi-fi. description: San Francisco Bay Watcher is a local social mobile media app that brings SF Bay Area neighborhood news, discussions and events to your smart phones and tablets. We are starting with news topics that cover local neighborhood issues, city government, attractions, interesting people and merchants in your community. Some of our articles are contributed by local groups and individuals who submit their messages and calendars via our media. SF Bay Watcher brings a new standard for neighborhood news and encourages SF Bay Area readership to participate more in their local community to resolve local issues. Our vision is to provide a free, feature rich, easy-to-use neighborhood news media app with content contributed by the local community. Key Features: • Read stories on what's happening in the Bay Area, city government and other articles that have a direct affect on local residents. • Read major metro newspaper content about local, nation and international news via news agencies’ RSS links. • Watch fun and trending videos before they go viral. You'll see them here first. • Watch videos on local “how to” that provide information, short-cuts, and step-by-step instructions on almost every topic including some that are unique to the SF Bay Area. • Browse entertaining photos and art contributed by local readers. • Real-time comments on each article, video and photo. You can also comment on other readers' comments as well. • You can real-time like or dislike each article, and browse the like and dislike summary for each article. • Browse selected local restaurants, bars, cafés and other merchant listings. • Browse local events, festivals, trade shows, flea markets and farmers markets schedules. • Articles can be shared via email, SMS and Facebook. • Displayed photos can be saved to your local Album

description: Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre l'alphabet en douceur. Voix et textes en français. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre à reconnaître les lettres de l'alphabet. Ce jeu, destiné aux enfants à partir de 2 ans, a la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux : - un jeu qui invite l'enfant à reconnaître la première lettre d'un animal ("A comme Abeille") - un jeu pour apprendre, facilement, à reconnaître une lettre parmi d'autres - un jeu pour apprendre à reconnaître une lettre parmi de nombreuses autres. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il trouve, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré, et propose une animation de plusieurs "scrollings" pour adoucir l’exercice. Les lettres se détachent de l’écran de manière beaucoup plus vive pour être bien identifiables par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à décrypter les lettres de l’alphabet, à les prononcer, à identifier les animaux (abécédaire)... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans… Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer… Educational games to learn the alphabet smoothly. Voices and texts in French. [Warranty virus free and no advertising / you can test the game in its free version] Educational games to learn to recognize the letters of the alphabet. This game, for children from 2 years, has the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if he can not read because it is only made from simple symbols, and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three game modes: - A game that invites the child to recognize the first letter of an animal ("A Bee as") - A game to learn, easy to recognize a letter among other - A game to learn to recognize a letter among many others. A very soft music accompanies the child in the exercise, and every time it finds, it is encouraged in its efforts with applause and "Bravo". The interface has been specifically designed for children. The graphic style is sweet and colorful, and offers several animation "scrolling" to soften the year. The letters stand for the screen so much more vivid to be easily identified by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, to decipher the letters of the alphabet, to pronounce, to identify animals (ABC) ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. For the record, this game was made for my 3 year old daughter ... of its success, I put on the "Play Store". I'm sure your children will be just as happy to play it ...

description: The "7 Minute Workout" is a research-backed workout program that has become an international hit! Published in the leading research journal ACSM, and then popularized by the NYT, the "7 Minute Workout" is simple but effective. Researchers have selected 12 exercises that are performed for 30 seconds with 10 second rest intervals. This high-intensity training with little rest results in higher daily metabolism and is the equivalent of working out for over an hour - for only slightly longer than 7 minutes. The best part? The exercises are simple to perform, do not require any equipment, and therefore, can be done anywhere! NO MORE EXCUSES. This app takes this research-proven workout and guides you through the process. Further, it tracks your results, and makes it fun by allowing you to unlock rewards as you continue working out. App features include: - stunning design - both male and female trainers that guide you by video, audio, image and text - all content is INCLUDED (no additional charges, and no need for internet connectivity) - track your weight with our weight tracker - track your activity with our activity calendar - workout and unlock various achievements We are dedicated fitness professionals and app developers. We strive to make the highest quality products - if you have any suggestions, feel free to contact us. Our apps are regularly updated at no charge.

This little character was originally invented by my daughter when she was eight years old. She made it and its house out of paper. She named the character "Eelooz". I - her father - thought that it was so cool so I decided to make an app of it - so here it is - Eelooz (on Android)! Eelooz lives in your phone. It has a bed to sleep in, a kitchen where it eats, and a TV room where it spends most of its time watching TV and reading story books. The story books feature Eelooz as main character where Eelooz is engaged in various exciting adventures. You can watch the stories together with Eelooz on the TV, or read them in a magazine format. The stories make use of the built-in Text-To-Speech feature included in your Android device. You can interact with Eelooz using your voice. Click on the microphone button and ask questions, or instruct Eelooz to do various things. Use instructions like "goto kitchen" to make it move to the kitchen. Wish Eelooz goodnight by saying "good night" when you want it to sleep and so on. Take care of your Eelooz, it needs to eat, drink and sleep every day. It also needs your love and care to be happy! Hope you enjoy Eelooz just as much as my daughter and her little sister have done for a long time now! Here are some of the comments we have received from our users: - Awsome Eelooz really listens.100000000000000000000000000000000000000 stars - Perfect Wow this is such an amazing app Eelooz is a great friend - Cute This is really adorable. My little sister adores it, and I must admit that I do as well - Wait is Eelooz a boy or a girl? But let's get to the point I super love it and by the way the ebook is awsome all the stories was awesome especially Super Eelooz and every time I was sad i played this game totally cheered me up thanks for making the best game I had played in my whole life. ******* NOTE ******** We recommend using IVONA Text-To-Speech for best speech reading experience. Search for IVONA on the Market, install it and set it as your default TTS engine (see IVONA installation instructions).

description: Voclab helps you to learn more than 4000 British English words in no time. Our scientific proven algorithm reminds you at the exact time to review words so that you will never forget them. This ensures that you maximize your language learning impact with your precious time used as efficiently as possible. Voclab will gradually increase the difficulty of words to ensure that you gain first a solid foundation of basic words before learning more complex ones. This enables you to quickly gain a good understanding of the language. Voclab gives you the following advantages: + Over 4,000 Words with high quality native speaker Audio (>250 words in free version) + All words have been carefully selected to cover the most important British English words + Special algorithm that considers your personal learning character to speed up your memorization + Fun Multiple Choice Quiz to test your knowledge + Follow your learning progress with our Statistics and ongoing Feedback + Get additional information for each word (e.g. word form and word category) If you need to prepare for a specific exam or topic, you can also focus on specific word categories or level of difficulties. You can choose words from more than 50 word categories and four levels of difficulties. Our word categories cover all important British English words, ranging from essential categories like colors, days of the week to more advanced categories of e.g. Economics and sciences. The VocLab algorithm takes care that you always learn words appropriate to your proficiency level. Voclab is developed by a team of language learning experts with ten years of experience in developing language learning software. If you like to learn more about our method, please visit our website at www.voclab.com. __________________ PLEASE NOTE: Please note that the App needs close to 50MB in internal memory. Make sure you have enough space. It can be moved to SD card after installation. We strongly suggest you to download and run the free trial version of the app to see if it is compatible with your device before purchasing the full version. LITE VERSION with access to more than 250 words __________________ Any problems or have feedback on how to improve the App, email us before negative comment. We will reply quickly. support@voclab.com

description: Requires the original free version of Task Bomb (updated to at least version 1.4): http://androidideas.org/taskbomb/google-play Extra features: * Export all app data (tasks, etc.) * Export a schedule * Import from a file TaskBomb is a task scheduling app that's small and simple, yet flexible. Please email me if you have any suggestions or problems. If you use the comments for this I can't really respond or ask questions to clarify. See the website for tons of info, help, and tutorials: http://androidideas.org/taskbomb Features: * Automate many of the things your phone can do: - Automatic app running - Automatically open some given file or url with some given app - Play a song, playlist, or online stream - Open a browser to a web page - Automatic shortcut running * Add-ons to do things like - Change the volume or gently raise it at a given time - Check if an online music stream is available - Run SL4A scripts at a certain time - Turn on and off Wi-Fi, Sync, and Bluetooth * Relative scheduling system allows you to create reusable sets of tasks to run at any time. * Snooze offered for any task or schedule you choose. # Note: Make sure task killers aren't interfering Task Bomb is an automation app (sometimes called "task scheduler", "job scheduler", "batch processor", etc.) that allows you to schedule apps and actions to automatically run. It's similar in function to the cron command on Linux and somewhat like an alarm clock (you can set alarms and snooze actions). TaskBomb aims to be small and simple, and leverage the power of the apps you have on your phone. One of Task Bomb's greatest assets is its unique and flexible scheduling system that allows you to create modular, reusable schedules that can be run at any time, attached to alarms, or added to other schedules. With home automation as a growing application of Android, this app could just be what you need to serve as a master controller for the bits and pieces you want to automate. You can schedule things ranging from very simple: "Play this song at 8:00 AM on weekdays." to more complex: "Run some scripts of mine before bed. 7 hours later start playing my favorite streaming radio station, or my second favorite one if that’s not available, or a local playlist if neither are available. Increase the volume gradually over 3 minutes. If I’m still not up after 10 minutes, switch to a playlist of sad songs." Put another way, Task Bomb is basically an Android job scheduler. Job scheduling is sometimes synonymous with batch scheduling, although batch schedulers typically use the command line. See the website below for lots of info, including tutorials and help. Please email any questions, suggestions, and feature requests to ken@androidideas.org

Inoltre, per tutti i possessori di Postepay, possibilità di salvare le operazioni più frequenti tra le Operazioni veloci, per richiamarle e finalizzarle in pochissimi passi! ************************** Postepay è l’applicazione ufficiale di Poste Italiane dedicata ai servizi in mobilità per la tua carta Postepay. Visualizza il saldo e i movimenti della tua Postepay, ricarica la tua carta o quella di un amico o ricarica una sim telefonica richiamando il numero dalla tua rubrica del telefono.  Se sei titolare di una Postepay Evolution accedi alle funzionalità a te riservate di Miniricarica, Bonifico e Postagiro. Puoi inoltre salvare le tue operazioni più frequenti grazie alla nuova funzionalità "operazioni veloci". Attiva il Sistema di sicurezza PosteID e autorizza le operazioni dispositive da app con il solo inserimento del codice PosteID scelto da te (maggiori info su www.poste.it/app). Con l’app Postepay puoi anche attivare gratuitamente una e-Postepay, la carta prepagata virtuale e ricevere via sms i suoi codici di utilizzo. La rubrica ti consente di memorizzare le carte che ricarichi più spesso e puoi assegnare un nome alle tue carte Postepay per riconoscerle meglio in fase di pagamento. Ricerca gli uffici postali e gli ATM Postamat dove ricaricare la tua carta Postepay. Puoi visualizzarli su lista o su mappa e ottenere le informazioni principali: indirizzo, orari di apertura, numeri di telefono.  Per accedere ai servizi informativi e dispositivi devi essere registrato al sito poste.it. Se ancora non lo sei, puoi farlo dall’area di login dell’app. La registrazione tramite app è consentita solo ai cittadini italiani maggiorenni e con domicilio in Italia. Per gli altri clienti la registrazione deve essere effettuata su poste.it. From today, if you hold Postepay Evolution, the prepaid card, rechargeable and with IBAN, you have a new feature of the app dedicated to you! You can make Miniricariche to other Postepay without paying commission costs within the limits provided daily recharge or dispose Transfer from your card to other bank accounts and giro accounts to the Italian Post. In addition, all holders of Postepay, ability to save frequently used operations between the Getting fast for recall and finish it in a few steps! ************************** Postepay is the official app of the Italian Post Office dedicated to mobile services for your Postepay card. View balance and transactions of your Postepay, recharge your card or that of a friend or a recharge sim phone by calling the number from your phone book. If you hold a sign Postepay Evolution of the features reserved for you Miniricarica, Bank and giro. You can also save your frequent tasks thanks to the new "fast operations." The phonebook allows you to memorize the cards that charged more often, and you can assign a name to your Postepay card to recognize them better in the payment phase. To access the information services and devices must be registered with the site poste.it. If still you are not, you can do so from the login app. The app is only allowed via registration to Italian citizens older and resident in Italy. For other customers, the registration must be made on poste.it.
