description: Finally... txt-book app lets you convert text-message (SMS + MMS) conversations into a creative and personalized text message book. Two unique PDF export styles: CONVERSATION or STORYBOOK. You can add a title, cover photo, nicknames, and back-cover note. Save it. Send it. File it. Print it. Keep for your records. Keep as a diary...or we'll bind it for the perfect gift! See below for helpful tips! · Download the app and start creating your first txt-book · Create your txt-book and decide to keep your book for $0.99 or upgrade to the UNLIMITED package to create, edit and send as many books as you like. · Convert SMS and MMS texts · Display large crisp photos · Videos appear as enhanced thumbnails · Select any date range ( For long text threads you can create several shorter books as Volume 1, 2, 3... ) · Remove unwanted messages and photos · Edit nicknames to personalize your txt-book · Privacy Guaranteed - All books are created locally on your phone - no data leaves your phone. · Create a book in as little as 30 seconds (if you have many texts/images it can take several minutes) · Print your book yourself -or- we'll professionally bind it for you. Visit www.txt-book.com for details and discounts. · Your txt-book arrives as a PDF file via your own e-mail service ***a copy of the txt-book PDF file is also saved to your phone's memory card ***If you do not receive your e-mail simply locate the file on your phone. A txt-book is a perfect and easy gift for anniversaries, birthdays, graduations, Valentine’s Day, long-distance relationships or just...because. Text message conversations chronicle our modern lives. With txt-book now you can preserve the jokes, fights and photos that we share every day. Two Unique Export Styles: CONVERSATION: Displays the texts and photos in bubbles similar to the way it appears on your phone. The date and time, if chosen, are displayed above each bubble as well as the speaker's name. Photos appear larger than they do in your text-message conversation. STORYBOOK: Adds phrases to the beginning and end of text messages so that your text conversations look and read like a novel. Text messages are always shown in quotes, and words like, "replied Kristin" are added after a text message. Sentences are used to introduce a new day such as, "On July 4, 2013 Mark texted Kristin," so your txt-book flows like a story. Photos appear larger than they do in your text-message conversation. You don't have to choose between one - if you get the UNLIMITED package, you can make as many books as you want. Change the way names appear in your book. You may decide to change your Father's name to, "Dad." Or your boyfriend's name to, "Boo." Your Cover Page features a photo that you select and a title that you create. The Back-Cover Note allows you to write a description that explains the book's meaning, or create a special message to the recipient such as, "To Kristin - I hope this book has a second volume. Please keep this to remind you of our first three months. Love, Mark." If you don't want a Title, Cover Photo or back-cover note then you can simply leave them out. Txt-book was created so people can transform the conversations between friends, family and lovers into a book. Many people simply use txt-book to keep a personal record of easy-to-read volumes of their day-to-day conversations. You can be the author of hundreds of txt-books...get started now!
release_text: Have your txt-book bound. Visit www.txt-book.com for information on how to bind your txt-book.

description: The game design is pretty simple yet very powerful. You play on 9 tic-tac-toe fields which form a big tic-tac-toe. The official rules can be found on http://mathwithbaddrawings.com/2013/06/16/ultimate-tic-tac-toe/ where the only twist is, that within our version a small tic-tac-toe is considered as “full” if somebody won the tic-tac-toe. This version of the game is a quick and rough version of a multiplayer (and Computer-Opponent) game. Please be patient while loading (give it maybe 15-20 seconds). It looks like nothing happens at the beginning; instead your opponent is eventually playing. We did not spend a lot of time for Design and Artwork, instead we were looking to have something stable and nice to play with… Checkout also our official developer website, there we explain everything a little bit better, the space here is just not sufficient enough ( http://expertino.com/tictactoe ) Also try the other ultimate tic tac toe versions, we saw that some of them have a better design, but lack in the multiplayer ability or don’t have computer opponents…

description: Bắt Chữ là một trò chơi thú vị, thuộc thể loại "đuổi hình bắt chữ" đầy trí tuệ nhưng cũng ngập tràn thư giãn. Bắt Chữ với kho dữ liệu phong phú, hấp dẫn, đa dạng, ở nhiều lĩnh vực. Nội dung câu đố đặc sắc thú vị, phù hợp với tất cả mọi người, đem lại cho bạn những giây phút thư giãn sảng khoái. Đây là tập 2, là phần kế tiếp của "Bắt Chữ". Các tính năng chính: + Kích thước file nhỏ, giúp tải nhanh hơn, cập nhật version mới nhanh hơn. + Bắt đầu từ level 700. Bạn cần đạt đến level 700 của Bắt Chữ 1 thì mới tiếp tục được. + Tăng Ruby khi chọn "Xem quảng cáo - Nhận Ruby". Thật hứng khởi khi tự mình khám phá những tầng ý nghĩa đặc sắc, hài hước, vui nhộn, bất ngờ, thú vị, mới lạ,... của các câu chữ ẩn đằng sau những hình ảnh quen thuộc. Bạn có thể sẽ không nhịn được cười khi mở ra các đáp án, những khuôn ảnh tưởng chừng như không liên quan, nhưng khi ghép lại với nhau, lại tạo thành những câu chữ kỳ thú. Bắt Chữ - khó mà dễ, dễ mà khó. Để vượt qua hết các câu hỏi, bạn cần có các kiến thức cả về tiếng Việt, Hán Việt, thậm chí cả tiếng Anh. Dải tri thức trải rộng từ các đồ vật thường dùng, đến địa lý, thể thao, danh nhân, lô đề, ... So với một số game cùng thể loại "đuổi hình bắt chữ" khác đã và đang tồn tại, bản game "Bắt Chữ" mới này có gì đặc sắc và khác biệt? Đầu tiên, đó là cách chơi cực kỳ đơn giản, kế thừa kiểu thao tác của game 4-pics-1-word nổi tiếng: không cần mô tả gợi ý, không cần mở bàn phím nhập chữ, không cần hạn chế thời gian. Thứ hai, đó là bộ hình ảnh được chăm chút rực rỡ sinh động, bạn chắc chắn sẽ không tìm ra một game nào tương tự có bộ dữ liệu đẹp hơn! Game là miễn phí! Khi gặp một từ mà không có trong kho tri thức của bạn, bạn có thể dùng điểm thưởng trong game để mở từ này. Hãy tận hưởng niềm vui, sự sảng khoái, và những bất ngờ thú vị với "Bắt Chữ"! description: Wind speed converter is a simple tool to convert between many various wind speed measurement scales. It may find specific use for all Kitesurfers, Windsurfers, Sailors and other fans of wind related activities. iOS and Android version will aslo show you your current wind speed based on your GPS location. Supported scales: - Beaufort - km/h - mph - knots - m/s

Tap the Sharks, Octopi, and Squid to defend yourself and the other marine life for points! Each level has a minimum point goal you must reach before you can get to the next level, after that you can breathe easy and rack up more points in your leftover time. If you do happen to hit the other sea creatures or buoys, you'll lose points. Preferences are available for Difficulty (Easy, Medium, Expert), Shark Size, and vibrate on Punch. The difficulty levels make Shark Punch fun and challenging for all ages. Try to top your personal high score while trying to conquer all 20 levels!
release_text: Version 1.2 has improved High Score input and display. Version 1.3 fixes minor bugs. Version 1.4 fixes an ad placement error.

Mmm, a yummy, frosty milkshake sounds good right about now, doesn't it? Create tasty dessert treats with Milkshake Maker, the best chocolate cooking and design game around! Make real ice cream treats with this fun app, perfect for beating the summer heat or just relaxing with a nice, yummy cream treat in your mouth. Chocolate, vanilla, strawberry or banana, all the flavors are here, and they're all delicious! Start cooking real, yummy chocolate milkshakes right away when you grab this app. Simply choose your ice cream flavor, add some milk, then turn the machine on to start cooking your treat. Ice cream doesn't need much coaxing to turn into a milkshake, so give it a few seconds, then pour it into a frosty glass and you're ready to go. But hold on, there, you forgot to decorate it! Add tons of different designs and toppings to your yummy ice cream treat, everything you need to turn a plain chocolate milkshake into a real dessert! Add sprinkles, frostings, whipped cream, candy, fruit and so much more. Your only limit is your own imagination, so go wild and start cooking a milkshake you'll never forget! You can even save and share your creations with your friends. Make them jealous and challenge them to a milkshake making competition. So tasty! Features: - Make your very own milkshake from scratch! - Pictures of real ingredients make the desserts come alive. - Yummy ice cream designs for the perfect treat. - Tons of milkshake flavors you'll love! - Plenty of toppings to decorate and design with! How to Play: - Use the touch screen to choose your milkshake flavors. - Mix everything together and pour it into a glass. - Add toppings, sip and enjoy! Please Note that Milkshake Maker! is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To disable this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under ""Allowed Content"". Want to know more about us? Visit our official site at http://www.crazycatsmedia.com Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/CrazyCatsGame Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Crazy-cats/1535721699976922
release_text: Crazy Cats is bringing to you a brand new update! Yes now you can create delicious desserts with ease! It has never been this simple before! With improved performance you can whip up yummy sugar creations smoothly and quickly! User interface has been improved for our awesome cooking chefs! Come get the update now!

description: Sumit is a simple but very attractive math puzzle game that will keep you playing until you win. Play the game by swiping the tiles to merge matching numbers. If two tiles of the same number collide while moving, they will merge into a tile with the total value of the two tiles that collided. Every turn, a new tile will appear with a value of either 1 or 2.

description: If you look closely, they’re everywhere: beautiful quotes, insights, simple but handy tips. For this app, we’ve combined 365 of them a with illustrations made by Lobke van Aar. 365 cards to make you feel connected, simplify your life, live mindfully or just to spoil yourself. We hope you enjoy it. And if it leaves you wanting more, you can order our print edition at flowmagazine.com/order. - Start any day of the year - Share cards via Instagram, Facebook, Twitter or email - Save your favorite cards - For iPhone and iPad Flow. A magazine that takes its time Celebrating creativity, imperfection, and life's little pleasures. Flow is a magazine for women who live busy yet happy lives, and who want to make different kinds of choices. They enjoy making things by hand, practical philosophy, positive psychology, and living in the moment. The best things in life happen when you follow your instincts. That’s how Flow was created, too. This Flow app is from the makers of Flow Magazine Compiled by Jocelyn de Kwant, Ellen Nij Bijvank and Nina Siegal, with contributions from Peggy van der Lee, Dorine Verheul, Julia Gorodecky and Caroline Buijs Translated by Ragini Werner | NEEDSer Design by Studio 100% and Marjan Peters Illustrations by Lobke van Aar Built by Diederik Meijer

description: Sleep well and wake up refreshed, forget about undersleeping, insomnia and connected health risks with the most intelligent alarm clock app on Google Play. Smart Alarm Clock monitors your sleep cycles and wakes you up at the right time based on the scientifically proven sleep cycles concept. How does the app work? During the night we go through several sleep cycles: transition to sleep, light sleep, deep sleep and dream sleep. In each of these stages we behave differently: toss and torn in bed, mutter or stay quiet. The sensors in your Android device detect all the movements, the app figures out which stage of sleep you are in and wakes you up during the light sleep stage, when your body is naturally prepared for awakening. Apart from monitoring your sleep cycles, Smart Alarm also records the sounds in your bedroom. Smart Alarm Clock also benefits 100+ high quality relaxation sounds (Nature, Urban, Lullabies, Classical Tunes, Binaural beats, Water, Guided Meditation, Rise & Shine) to fall asleep in harmony. Smart Alarm Clock: * Determines the best time to wake you up * Provides detailed statistics of your sleep cycles and stages * Weather forecast: detailed weather stats from anywhere in the world * Records your bedroom sounds if they are longer than 5 seconds * Includes 100+ specially designed chill-out and wake-up music Our users like Smart Alarm Clock: “I fixed my bad sleep schedule with this.” “It is without a doubt the best clock app out there at the minute” 1) Fall asleep listening to the high quality relaxation sounds: 2) Monitor you sleep cycles and record disturbances during the night. 3) Wake up at the right time to avoid under- or oversleeping or at the exact time you set before. Note: Charge your phone while sleeping! Install Smart Alarm Clock and we’ll take care of your relaxation, deep sleep and accurate wake up!

description: This is the Code Of Administrative Offences Of Russia (Russian Federation, RF). The Reference is OFFLINE and does not need the internet connection. Database will be downloaded when the application is run first time. We recommend you to use Wi-Fi connection. Это Справочник - Кодекс Российской Федерации (России) об Административных Правонарушениях (КоАП РФ). Справочник работает в режиме ОФФЛАЙН и не требует интернет-соединения для работы. База данных будет загружена при первом запуске. Используйте wi-fi соединение. Main features: 1. History – every article you ever viewed is stored in history. 2. Favorites – you are able to add articles to favorites list by clicking the “star” icon. 3. Managing History and Favorites lists – you are able edit those lists or clear them. 4. Various Settings – you may change application’s font and theme (choose one of several color themes). 5. Random article of the day widget. To see the widget in the list the application must be installed to phone memory (reference database may be installed anywhere). This app contains advertising.

description: 650+ hotels in your pocket Apps for all Our helpful apps make searching for a hotel and booking a room even speedier. Log in, store your details securely and book with just a tap. Quick and simple booking Check availability, book a room, add on a Premier breakfast and pay securely – in just a few taps. Book on the move and at any time, even on the day of your arrival. Finally an intelligence game as an App for these devices" by Rjsbxkdn PUT YOUR GENERAL KNOWLEDGE TO THE TEST WITH HUNDREDS (OR THOUSANDS) OF QUESTIONS DIVIDED INTO 6 THEMATIC CATEGORIES IN ONE OF THE WORLD'S MOST FAMOUS TRIVIA GAMES! MAIN FEATURES * Official version, true to the classic board game. * Single-player mode: Test your knowledge against the computer in any of the three difficulty levels (Smart, Wise and Genius.) * Multiplayer mode: Have fun playing against your friends and family in games for up to 6 simultaneous players. * Gather coins! Answer the questions correctly, earn and/or steal stars and clear rounds in order to gather "coins" you will later be able to use in the Online Store to unlock Theme or Difficulty question packs for free! * Online Store: Unlock new Theme packs with hundreds of additional questions on several topics (e.g. Music, Movies, TV series packs), or get the Walking Encyclopedia pack with over 2400 questions for the 6 main categories. * Do you think you know it all...? Answer correctly as many questions as possible in each game and unlock the increasing Difficulty packs! If you don’t want to wait and you are ready for the test, get them directly in the Online Store. * Music: 3 different music styles for you to choose from for your games. ***If you experience any technical difficulties, please contact us at support@widowgames.com as we cannot contact you to solve those issues through the Comments section. Thanks!*** Technical notes: 1- If the game is reinstalled, previously acquired questions packs will not be lost. You only have to select them once again in the Online Store and they will be re-enabled without extra charge. However, please bear in mind that, when the game is reinstalled, all coins collected will be lost.
release_text: Hi! We continue to improve our game based in your feedback! Now, anytime you answer correctly, you will be given the option to roll the dice again, which makes the game more fun than ever! And for those who dare... we have also unlock the Difficulty Packs for purchase. Thanks for playing! The Widow Games team

description: ~Thanks for over 50,000 downloads!~ Get the Pro version with more new features and an even more simple design! Search Chalkboard Pro for Go SMS in Google Play Store! The simplest form of a Go SMS Theme you can get. Chalkboard Theme combines the classic green chalkboard you used in high school with the functionality of the Go Dev Team's Go SMS. Installation: 1. Make sure you have the newest version of Go SMS installed to your device. 2. Download and install Chalkboard Go SMS Theme. 3. Open Go SMS, tap your menu button. 4. Select "Themes", find "chalkboard". 5. Select "chalkboard" and Apply! Questions, comments, suggestions: Zephyrzypher@gmail.com

Play as the famous mechanic builder of Car/ Ambulance/ Autos garage in town. Use your mechanic skills to build hospital emergency surgery cars in the workshop. Tap and drag tools to build and welding emergency surgery autos in your garage and workshop. Select design you want to build in your workshop. As builder you got all tools, for welding, repair and construction. Screwdriver and paintbrush all are there. You can also add car body tattoos, stickers, wheels and vinyl too. We offer you to play as little mechanic builder in this workshop. Design and build brand new autos for city hospital. It’s fun game for little kids to learn many things. They learn about colors, paintbrush, tattoos, and stickers. How they can paint body and add tattoos or stickers, wheels and vinyl in the ambulance in this fun game. Get your tools welding, paintbrush, screwdriver to design a build tattoos, colorful ambulance for them. City hospital needs new ambulances for emergency injured surgery patient’s transportation. They want to provide best transportation facility for the injured surgery patients. As mechanic builder it’s your job to create great ambulance in your garage. They want you to design and build some brand new ambulances for their hospital surgery patients. Design emergency hospital auto in your workshop. Play as little mechanic; get ambulance builder & garage downloaded in your smart phone. Make your little kids learn and plays how to design create brand new ambulances in colorful and fun way. Decorate your car with tattoos and stickers. FEATURES • Simple and effective controls. • Tap & drag over the body structure to build ambulances. • Wonderful steps wise emergency car construction in workshop. • Create and customize autos in your garage. • Stunning and neat animations and sounds. • Work perfectly with your touch screen devices.

A new version of Moustachify has been released! Grab it from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=twig.nguyen.mustachify2 The online services which THIS app relied on to work (face.com and imageshack) are no longer available. ----- Ever wondered what someone would look like if they had a mustache? There have been over 92,000 photos submitted to mustachify so what are you waiting for!? Wonder no more! Moustachify will add a moustache to almost any face! Need an instant moustache on your: - baby son? - girlfriend? - ... GRANDMA? Simply take any photo and this magical app will do the rest for you. Plenty of funny photos for everyone! Save your mustachified photo and share it with your friends today! Works best on: - Humans (and sometimes dogs) - When part of the face is not hidden - Faces are straight or slightly rotated What it WON'T do: - Add beards to people - Turn you into Tom Selleck

description: New: AARP Bulletin is now an app! Now you can read AARP Bulletin in a format that helps you understand the issues that impact your world – health, money, and more - from wherever you are! The go-to source for news you can use for 50+ Americans, AARP Bulletin chronicles the changing 50+ landscape and gives readers valuable insights into the news that is transforming their lives. Published ten times a year, AARP Bulletin focuses on health and health policy, Medicare, Social Security, consumer protection, personal finance, the changing workplace, independent living, and AARP state and national news developments. · Clip, save and share your favorite stories · Link directly from an article to breaking news, exclusive web features and special offers? · Search for articles and content by headline, page number, subject and more?? Read the latest issue to learn the latest about your health, money, and more. All in one app! For more back issues visit our online newsstand: http://newsstand.aarp.org For more mobile apps, visit: http://www.aarp.org/mobile ____________________ This application is powered by GTxcel, a leader in digital publishing technology, provider of hundreds of online digital publications and mobile magazine apps.
World Champion Soccer Brazil game. Find all the balls and win the world cup! Watch out for the referee and other players.

“Light means small, fast and easy to use!” Are you tired of complicated operations and features when surfing the internet? And bored with the low speed when loading the webpage either? If the answer is ‘Yes’, then you need a ‘Light’ browser! Light Browser is a fascinating browser! It can improve the browsing speed, and save the memory of your device. And especially suitable for the devices which the size of screen is limited. The most important is that, it’s Easy! Although it doesn’t support lots of complex features, it DOES meet most of the users’ needs. And since the small size of the app, the loading speed is much faster than others. Features: 1. Gallery View 2. Share Link/page 3. Bookmark Management 4. Screenshot 5. Find on Page Not only the using, but the UI is also simple and comfortable! Generally the Light Browser will make you fondle admiringly. English, Spanish, Portuguese and Russian are supported in this version. Making the browsing experience ‘Light’ is our goal! And we are keeping on improving the products at anytime. Please don’t hesitate to mail us when you have any ideas or problems. We can be reached via galaxysoft.ltd@gmail.com . Thanks for your support.

description: This math puzzle game has one purpose... get to 100. Click on the individual circles to move your score up by the given amount. Once clicked on, the circles turn blue if you do not release while touching them. If a blue circle bumps into another circles, game over. Do not go over 100 or game over. There are 100 levels with different numbers and types of circles. Have fun!

Questa "app" consente di individuare le 3 fermate degli autobus di "AMT Genova" più vicine alla posizione in cui ci si trova. Mostra le coordinate geografiche del punto e riporta il nome della fermate individuate. Scegliendo una di queste si ottengono alcune info di dettaglio e i passaggi dei bus in tempo reale. Le fermate utili possono essere salvate nell'elenco delle preferite. Vengono reperite dal sito ufficiale di AMT Genova le ultime novità pubblicate dall'azienda e le tabelle delle partenze programmate ai capolinea delle varie linee. This "app" allows identification of the 3 bus stops "AMT Genova" closest to the location where you are located. Show the geographical coordinates of the point and shows the name of the stops identified. By choosing one of these you will get some info in detail and the steps of the bus in real time. Links to useful can be saved in the list of preferred networks. Are obtained from the official website of AMT Genoa the latest news published by the company and the tables of scheduled departures to the terminus of the various lines.

Meet PoPo, the chubby panda who just can't get enough ice cream. Imagine his surprise when he wakes after a summer snooze to find the cheeky gorilla Uggi has stolen his icy treats! Roll the rotund little bear around each level and chase Uggi to the hole. You'll have to choose the best route if you want to collect all your missing ice creams though. Roll in the Hole may look super cute but there’s more than enough challenge and outside-the-box puzzles here to keep players of all ages entertained in this super-addictive, family-fun adventure! **Runs beautifully on tablets** • AMAZING LEVEL DESIGN - 72 incredibly varied and fun-to-play levels where grass, sand and ice will affect PoPo's roll. Master your environment to stay in the game! • PERFECT CONTROLS- Playing as PoPo is a breeze, intuitive control of spin and direction means that anyone can have a go, you'll be a natural after just a few seconds. Choose to press either side of the screen or tilt the device. • TO BOLDLY GO WHERE NO PANDA HAS GONE BEFORE- Follow the hilarious story that takes PoPo from the jungle into outer space! • CHARISMATIC CHARACTERS- Control PoPo on his adventure and meet cute characters Uggi the Gorilla and Zappi the Alien. • HILARIOUS SOUNDS- Cute and funny sound effects will put a smile on your face as you bounce and roll your way through the weird and wonderful worlds. ** We have noticed that customers running OS 3.2 on their Motorola Xoom have had problems running this game on their device. We are investigating the issue, but advise updating your Xoom to OS 3.2.1 as soon as possible, which will fix this issue. **

Progress through lots of chambers filled with puzzles, brainteasers and minigames! ★ FEATURES ★ - Many different level themes with high definition graphics (best played on a tablet) - Makes heavy use of device features like the Accelerometer and Multi-Touch - A soundtrack that causes goose bumps – composed by “Hurrican” creator Eiswuxe ★ HOW TO PLAY ★ - Interact with objects / drag them around – shake / tilt your device and use your brain in the attempt to open the door in each chamber - Certain objects can be carried in your inventory and used throughout multiple levels The game currently features 50 / 100 levels and will be updated from time to time. ★ ATTENTION ★ If your android device supports not more than 2 touch points simultaniously, you can skip chamber 12 and 35 by holding down the sound on/off button for about 10 seconds. ★ ADDITIONAL INFO ★ Found a bug? Please consider emailing a description to me so I can fix it asap. Thanks! Got an awesome Chamber idea? I'm all ears! Don't miss this one if you already played 100 floors, 100 gates, 100 crypts, 100 doors, 100 rooms and all the other escape the room and hidden object games! Thanks to Eiswuxe, cgtextures.com, Kalan, Atomsplitter, all-vectors.com, PacDV and IIT Bombay.
release_text: - added chambers 41-50 - adjusted arcade game difficulty - audio bugfixes ★ ATTENTION ★ If your android device supports not more than 2 touch points simultaniously, you can skip chamber 12 and 35 by holding down the sound on/off button for about 10 seconds.

description: Inheritance 3D game in the first generation of Speed Night. Experience more realistic physics engine, and enjoy the fun of midnight racing. Game content: Tap the left and right of the screen to control the steering of your car, escaped on the road NPC vehicles. The row beginning of the process, you can collect the gold coins. By gold coin to unlock the props. The course of the game provides the following capabilities: 1. Magnet: lessons within a certain range of gold used for a certain period of time. 2. Missile: blow up the NPC the vehicle before you. 3. Time: Every time you pass the finish line, increase one time. 4. Acceleration: speed over a period of time. The game offers online leaderboards, you can compete with players all over the world!

This is an extension for OI Shopping List that lets you enter or check items by scanning them. Requires * ZXing Barcode Scanner * OI Shopping List 1.2.4 or higher. Currently only US UPC barcodes are resolved automatically. European EAN products have to be entered manually, but are remembered.

Spanish Baby Flash Cards is now available for Android! Categories include: Food items, Animals, Alphabet, Transportation, Numbers, Colors & Shapes, Clothing, Household items, Body Parts, Outdoor items, Music Instruments/Arts & Learning. ★ Over 450 words! ★ 11 Categories - All in 1 App! ★ FREE! ★ Kids tested - they love it! Parents tested - they love it! ★ Building vocabulary has never been so much fun ★ Large words and letters ★ Large icons and buttons ★ Professional voice overs recorded in production studio ★ High quality images ★ Real sounds where applicable ★ Question mode for parent-child interaction ★ Great memory building exercise Building strong Spanish vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. eFlash Educational Baby Flash Cards in Spanish features over 450 high quality images with text and voice overs. There are additional real sounds where applicable (such as a lion's roar or an ambulance siren) to enhance visual and auditory learning and memory simultaneously. Parents have the option to turn voice overs off during parent-child learning session and turn voice overs on when the child is self-learning. They can enable Question Mode to display 4 images and ask the child to click on the right answer. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 4 so two or more young siblings can play together and even teach each other!

description: To Do Reminder - “Make life easier” Memory like a sieve? Now there’s no need to remember all those things that you have to do, because To Do Reminder can do that for you! It’s quick and easy to use; you can set a task in the reminder list in mere seconds. It has following key features - Easy and quick to set reminders. - No need to type anywhere in the application, you can handle it with a voice. - Set one-off task, or repeat it daily, weekly, monthly,Weekdays,Yearly. - Synchronise birthdays of your friends from Facebook, Phonebook, Google Calendar, or add them manually. - Send birthday wishes to your friends. - Post birthday wishes on your friends Facebook wall or send them Wishes by Gmail, SMS, WhatsApp. Important Note - Sony Xperia phone users! Make sure to add application to 'Stamina Mode' white list - without it alarm won't be able to wake up the device! Please make sure that you don't prevent the alarms from working with a battery saver app, a task killer app. Why does the app ask permissions to access personal data? Contact access - It allow the app to sync birthdays from phonebook and show that on Birthdays screen Photos / Media / Files- It allow the app to take backup or restore the tasks and birthdays. Identity: - It helps you to notify that, is there an important bug fix or an app update. Got a question or suggestion? Just email us, and we will be happy to help. YOU CAN HELP! BY * Give Rating and comment on Google Play. * Like us on Facebook  https://www.facebook.com/ToDoReminder * Join us on Google+ page  https://www.google.com/+Todoreminder * Share and join on Facebook, Google+ or twitter using this link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ToDoReminder.gen It will keep us motivated to work on new features.You can contact with us at http://www.todoreminder.com Thanks :)
release_text: 1) Sync Birthdays from Google Calendar 2) Now user can delete multiple birthdays 3) UI Improvement 2) Bug Fixes and performance improvements. Please make sure that you don't prevent the alarms from working with a battery saver app, a task killer app or a STAMINA mode (Sony Xperia).

description: Repeat the color, a simon (tm) copycat like game. A simple and addictive game that will help to improve your memory. You have to repeat the sequence of the sounds and lights using the buttons until you press the wrong button. Download this game, a clon of classic Simon (trademark), and enjoy a lot of fun training your brain. This free game is perfect for childrens. Four players can play five different game modes in three speed levels. Beat your friends and try to get the greatest score. This game also allows you to post your best scores on-line and share it with others World players. This is a free version (with ads). Properties: - For smartphones and tablets - Up to 4 players - 5 game modes - 3 speed levels - High scores - Online high scores - Works off-line - for FREE Game modes: 1) Classic: You have to repeat the classic sequence 2) Rewind: You have to repeat the sequence reverse 3) Blind: You have to repeat the sequence without lights (only sound) 4) Reset: The sequence change every turn 5) Memory: Only the last note of the sequence is played

We thank you for your support all these years. ** BarakAllahufikum and Ramadan Kareem. ******************************************** Read the Holy Quran in Arabic alongside its translation. Provides verse by verse audio playback, color coded Tajweed, repeat functions, unlimited bookmarks, search, excellent navigational controls, several translations and reciters and much more. NOTE: Permission to "read phone state" is only required in order to pause recitation in case the phone rings or in case you place a call while recitation is playing in the background. With iQuran you enjoy: * Color coded Tajweed (Pronunciation) Rules, the first and only Qur'an software to offer live rendered Tajweed rules. * Zoom-in feature to enlarge Arabic script * Full landscape support * Unlimited bookmarks and tags with notes * Several translations * Quranic Supplications * A powerful full-text search engine * Several downloadable recitations for verse by verse recital (supports gapless/continuous recitation for all reciters except Husary) * Powerful audio controls with an option to group playback of verses to aid in memorization iQuran provides the following translations: * English & Transliteration * German * French * Indonesian * Urdu (requires OS 3.0+) * Farsi (requires OS 3.0+) * Melayu * Spanish * Turkish * Russian * Bosnian * Dutch * Italian * Albanian * Romanian * Japanese Included reciters are: * Sheikh Husary * Mishary Al-Afasy * Saood & Shuraim * Abu Bakr Ash-Shatree * Abdul Basit * Ghamdi * Mahir Al-Muayqali iQuran has been designed to work on all Android devices. Keywords: Quran, Islam, Islamic, Koran, Qur'an, Muslim, Digital Quran

description: In Nature Mania you can prove how well you know the nature. Know fruits, vegetables, animals and more!

For over 25 years RST has been known worldwide as a company that can be relied on for innovative products in the realm of cable attachment technology. With this application Android users can now access the RST Product Catalogue by mobile connection. The application gives you an overview of the whole range of products from RST: from cable glands through pressure equalisation elements to enclosure technology and accessory articles. Overview of the Catalogue Cable Glands RST offers a comprehensive range of cable glands and through-feed systems for use in industrial and Ex areas. Among these are products such as Euro-Top made of polyamide (IP 68), Euro-Top made of brass and stainless steel (IP68/IK69K), or Alpha X and Delta X (IP66/68) for Ex e/d applications. A new arrival is the Euro-Top QF (IP68) cable gland, which due to a special connecting system can be assembled very quickly and securely. Almost all RST cable glands are available with metric, PG or NPT threads. EMC-Range Cable glands of the Euro-Top EMC series are used for fixing shielded cable. The design of the 3rd and 4th generation guarantee the sealing of the cable with protection class IP68 (partially also IP69K) and strain relief in accordance with EN 50262 / Category A. Euro-Top EMC glands are very easy to assemble, versatile in their use and vibration proof, due to their unique and patented contact system. Enclosure Systems Under this heading you will find a comprehensive offer of standard enclosures made of ABS, polycarbonate, polyester and stainless steel. Special enclosure variants, for example those for use in Ex-areas, are a firm part of our product range. For detailed information – including regarding customer-specific configuration and equipping of the enclosure – please request our complete catalogue or get in contact with us. Pressure Balance Systems Pressure equalisation systems serve to effectively prevent the formation of water condensation in tightly-sealed connecting enclosures and other electronic and electro-technical components. This results in a marked reduction of the costs of expensive enclosures and regular maintenance. RST pressure equalisation systems are available in polyamide or stainless steel according to your wishes (in each case in protection classes IP66, IP68 and IP69k) and partly approved for Ex application. New on the market are our cable glands with integrated pressure equalisation function. Accessories RST offers you a wide range of accessories and attachments for cable glands and pressure equalisation elements such as screw plugs, locknuts, reducers, enlargers and sealing rings. Approvals For international sales, certification has a very high priority. This is why RST products have a large number of approvals and certificates such as UL, VDE, CSA, ATEX, GOST, IECEx, NEPSI or ECLAC/CEPEL. Areas of Application Among other areas, RST products are to be found in the following branches: - Machine and engine technology - Automation technology - Measurement and control technology - Solar and wind energy - Food industry technology - Pump technology - The petrochemical industry

(More functions will be added in future version. Please rate it kindly on market. Thanks!:) This is an app which can help you to keep privacy information. It has: Keep privacy No AD, no third-party plugin, no root permission required, even no internet access permission! It is IMPOSSIBLE to send any data out by this app! :) Security Login Use password login or pattern login, no register required. First time user need create a new digital number password (by entering numbers of "0"~"9" and press "#" to confirm for twice). Password login uses 6~32 digital numbers with random position. After login, user can create login pattern in "Settings->Login Option->Create Pattern". And pattern login uses 16 points or 9 points pattern (support reuse point for pattern, e.g. points 1->2->1->2->1->2 is a valid pattern). Full data encryption (AES strength) All data you enter will be encrypted before save! It is tough task to decrypt the data even your data is exposed by some reason. Text Note User can save privacy note with this app, do not afraid of be watched by "CLOUD", swpie to mark it as finished or not, set diff importance level, sort note with diff ways, also can share to others... Checklist Checklist is a collection of note, can be easily used for check check item of same job (e.g. travel requirement). All check item is same function as text note. Picture Note Pick a picture from album or take photo from camera, the app will encrypt it and save. After that user can view/browse pictures inside the app without decrypt data to external file! Of course, user can send picture to others with share function. :) Secure Documents User can encrypt any file selected from sd card, delete encrypted file, or export & decrypt file to selected folder; Password Bank Nowadays, we have too many accounts/passwords to remember. Same passwords are dangerous, diff passwords are difficult to remember, so you can save them in security password bank (SPB)! It also suuport add multi account to same site easily. Sync Encrypted Data User can sync encrypted data with "Droidsail DataSync" between local device (phone/table) and selected web drive (Dropbox, Google Drive, , MS SkyDriver). Data are keep encrypted on web drive which is safe for user data (no privacy risk even for sync)!:-) Optimized UI for pad Auto detect screen size and fit it, especially for pad. Very small package size The unit is KBytes! Most similar app takes x MBytes!
release_text: 1. Add secure documents function. Encrypt/decrypt any file; 2. (Pro version only) Add "Create shadow account" function. 3. Fix the issue that sometimes the preview of picture note is abnormal; 4. Add "Random Number Pos" option in settings page; 5. Add message dialog to tell user how to create login password on the first run; 6. Fix the issue that the app may go to pattern login page after user data wiped; 7. Add picture frame for picture note;

description: The Holy Bible (WEB - World English Bible) - Browse Testaments, Books, Chapters or Verses. - Reading plans: several reading plans to read the Bible in 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 or 365 days. (Some plans are only available in PRO version). - Resume reading from last read verse with a single click! - (New) Desktop Widget: read random verses every hour. - Settings section to easily configure the app. - Swipe from left to right to browse to the previous chapter/plan or from right to left to navigate to the next chapter/plan. - New design with ActionBar! Special layout for tablets. - Copy verses into the clipboard - New IconPack - Contextual search for terms: clicking the search icon you can search within whole Bible, a Testament, a Book or even a Chapter. - A long press over a verse will addc it to favourites or let you share it on social media and messaging apps. - Browse your favourite verses. You can delete each one of them making a long press. - Set the font size: for a comfortable read. Special features in "World English Bible PRO": - All plans are available - Choose between three different contrast modes (day, night, sepia) - Read the Bible in landscape / horizontal or vertical mode. - No ads. - Improved speed
release_text: - Desktop Widget: read random verses every hour. - Improved Settings section: new parameters added. - UI improvements. - New reading plan available.

description: Meditation is the best inner development method ever discovered. Train your mind, calm your thoughts, analyze them or get deep inner insight of yourself. By meditating, your body heals faster, brain runs smoother, thoughts begin to organize themselves. You start to clarify your existence. This is the app that gives you control of your self development process. ********************** Note: This is a free trial version of the app. In the description below it will be noticed which features are avaliable in trial. ********************** FEATURES: Quickly choose between single mode or highly customizable meditation plans directly after application starts. Make notes after each meditation's session. All of them will be stored in your history and statistic charts for further reviewing or editing if you want that. Single mode: Easy, fast and custamizable mode for quick setup of meditation. What you can do: - Set up the duration of meditation (Hours:Minutes) - Swiff to choose the category between Meditation, Meditation with Affirmation and Fall Asleep mode. Affirmation mode let's you to type and save the affirmation sentence you want to focus your meditation on. Fall Asleep category has always given setup for quieting the each next time sound is playing. Meditation Plans [*Full version feature*]: - Programmable medtitation plans with as many programmable steps as you want to have in. - What you can do: - Create as many plans as you want - Name and edit the plan title how and whenever you want - Create any amount of steps you need for each plan - Choose the category of meditation for each step - Set up duration time for each step (Hours:Minutes) - Edit every previously created step - Delete step - Edit current category step or it's duration from the main window of application (directly after it's started). So you don't have to click Plan Settings icon all the time to do that. Statistics: [*Selectable days avaliable in full version*] - Zoomable and scrollable statistics, divided into 7, 30, 90, 365 days and 'Show All' selectable options. - Each select mode displays overall amount of hours/minutes of meditations for choosen period of time. description: Can you remember ALL your personal PIN’s, account or usernames? SafeMe securely stores all data using the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with 256 bit, to protect your data such as account numbers, user names, contact information, personal notes and much more from unauthorized access. AES provides strong encryption and has been selected by NIST as a Federal Information Processing Standard in November 2001 (FIPS-197), and in June 2003 the U.S. Government (NSA) announced that AES is secure enough to protect classified information up to the TOP SECRET level, which is the highest security level and defined as information which would cause “exceptionally grave damage” to national security if disclosed to the public. -= SafeMe - Password Manager - manage Passwords =- - App protected by Pin entry (up to 10 digits) >> Safety Note: Avoid unsafe pins as 1111, 2222, 1234 etc. << - Delete all data after X failed login attempts - Alarm-Option for quick lock - Categorization via color management - Storing personal data such as user names, contact details, account numbers, private notes and much more - Save all your entries with AES-256-Encryption - built-in password generator with various settings to generate secure passwords - Send selected Data to Clipboard or E-Mail

description: They don't call them the GREAT Smoky Mountains for nothing! Indeed, the Smokies is the most visited national park in the country--and this guide will show you why. It covers the best things to do in the national park as well as attractions, restaurants, accommodations, and shopping opportunities in the surrounding gateway communities of Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Sevierville, Townsend, and Cherokee. (The most popular locations are covered in the greatest depth.) Whatever your bliss--going miniature golfing amidst dinosaurs, hiking to waterfalls you can walk behind, floating in mid-air at a skydiving simulator, discovering chic sandwich shops and gourmet hotspots, soaking in a private hot tub with amazing mountain views, or shopping for outlet bargains and local crafts--this essential guide's got you covered. With this app you can: * get the real insider's scoop on what to see and do in the Smokies * sort entries you want to read by geographic area, by price, or by category * view more than 2,400 gorgeous images * get prices, rates, and hours * link directly to an entry's webpage and/or call its phone number * get turn-by-turn directions and see it on a map ★ About the Author ★ Travel writer and Knoxville resident Katy Koontz has been hooked on the Smokies for more than two decades. She's shrieked in their haunted houses, snapped up their Appalachian crafts, hit holes-in-one on their miniature golf courses (that's putt putt to you fellow locals), hiked their peaks, biked their valleys, gone tubing down their cold mountain rivers, whizzed through their treetops on ziplines, rode horseback through their woods, and rolled down their slopes inside a giant Zorb sphere. (She's even snorkeled the Smokies!) Her research has taken her to every corner of the gateway towns of Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Sevierville, Townsend, and Cherokee to regularly report on the newest and craziest attractions, the best places to stay (for romantic getaways as well as family vacations), and the greatest grub the region has to dish out. She also taps into the national park's natural nirvana on a regular basis. Katy is also the author of Family Fun in the Smokies: A Family-Friendly Guide to the Great Smoky Mountains (published by the Great Smoky Mountains Association, 2012) ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com

This is a Liar's Dice Professional User Interface (showing probabilities). We assume that your already know the game rules. Liar's Dice is a dice game where each player is given five dice and cup to roll and hide them with. Players make successively higher declarations regarding the results of all the dice remaining in the game, e.g. "there are ten sixes". However, someone can always contest the bid. When that happens, all the dice are revealed and either the bidder or the caller loses dice, depending on who was correct. The last player with dice is the winner. Remember, one is WILD, it values any die number, every time a player place a bid, it needs to be higher than previous one, e.g: if someone says there are "three twos", a valid bid could "three threes" up to "three sixes", or also another valid bid could be increasing the number of dice, like "four threes", "six sixes"... On any situation a player might want to play with only WILDS (number 1), in such case the amount of dice of the current bid needs to be divided by 2 plus 1, e.g: if the current bid is "seven sixes", getting into WILDS should be the integer part of (seven / 2) plus 1, so you get "four ones/wilds", for getting out from wilds simply multiply the number of ones/wilds by 2, so, in our previous example you will get 8 of something... any doubts, simple send me an email.

description: Webroot Business Mobile provides essential security for Android smartphones and tablets. Protection for iOS devices is available in the Apple iTunes Store https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mobile-protection/id565693635?mt=8 Webroot SecureAnywhere Business - Mobile Protection should be downloaded for business use only as it requires the cloud-based Webroot SecureAnywhere Mobile Administrative console that has been configured for businesses. The app will only function with a username and invite code provided by an IT Administrator and will not run standalone. MOBILE SECURITY ►Automatically scans apps for malware and viruses ►Set it and forget it – continuous protection without battery drain, interruptions or slowdowns ►Real-time anti-phishing identifies and blocks fake websites ►Warns about infected websites before they are visited ►Blocks unwanted calls and text messages ►Social network protection including Facebook and Twitter ►Analyzes devices and operating systems to detect system issues ►Identifies which apps are able to access personal information ►View battery usage information, and monitor which apps are accessing the network LOST DEVICE PROTECTION ►Lock – Remotely lock device if lost or stolen ►Locate – See device’s GPS location ►Scream – Sound an alert to help find device ►Wipe – Erase data from the device if lost or stolen ►SIM Card Lock – Device is automatically locked if someone removes the SIM card *3G, 4G, or W-Fi connection required for lost device features DEVICE MANAGEMENT ► Cloud simplicity makes deployment of business mobile security fast and easy via email, SMS or QR code, and updates will not impede performance or productivity. ►Intuitive, central management control for visibility and reporting on mobile devices and PCs ►Mobile dashboard provides real-time status of devices needing attention ►Executes remote commands for general and lost device protection ►Configure email, Wi-Fi and Device Administration policy settings remotely ►Customizable alerts via email or SMS ►Ability to create Policy Groups and default policies including: Antivirus shields, Lost Device Protection, SMS Blocking, Secure Web Browsing and Password/ Lock enforcement SUPPORTED OPERATING SYSTEMS Android 2.3 or later PRODUCT LANGUAGES English, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) Dutch, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish Technical support in over 65 languages. Live-phone based support available. World-class support with 95%+ satisfaction rating. Webroot is the largest privately held security organization based in the United States – operating globally across North America, Europe and the Asia Pacific region. Webroot brings the power of software-as-a-service (SaaS) to Internet security with an award-winning suite of Webroot SecureAnywhere® offerings for businesses, and consumers, as well as delivering security intelligence solutions to cybersecurity organizations. LEARN MORE •More info on Webroot SecureAnywhere® Business – Mobile Protection: http://www.webroot.com/us/en/business/products/mobile/ •Support: http://www.webroot.com/us/en/support/support-business •Privacy Policy: http://www.webroot.com/En_US/about-privacy.html

description: App for easy and cheap calling with Czech virtual mobile operator odorik.cz with using (not only) callback. This application provides ability to order callback via internet or SMS with often more suitable and friendly prices. The main functions of Odorik callback app: * callback to number * callback to Skype login * direct call (GSM) via your actual operator * redirect and call (GSM) with using of self public Odorik phone number (suitable for calling to abroad) * call route management on self public Odorik phone number (for call routing and parallel ringing features) * order callback via Internet data connectivity(Odorik API) * order callback via SMS (when you simply have not Internet access) * defined behavior of app when the selected method has failed (app will connect you with callee using alternative call method) When you make order a callback via SMS then the prices are according to your actual mobile operator. The tutorial and how-to you can find there [CZ]: http://www.odorik.cz/w/odorik_callback_pro_android More about prices of calling over Odorik mobile operator you can find on www.odorik.cz. Odorik callback is official application of odorik.cz (miniTEL s.r.o.)
release_text: ## 1.8 ## * Solved bug causing application failure on devices without application PhoneApp (com.android.phone) in direct call mode (Grandstream GXP2200). * English language support added (as default). * Russian language support added for Ukraine and Russia. * Czech language is used for Slovakia too. * Target SDK version is nowí Android 4.4. * Implemented intercept outgoing calls - view the finishing dialogue on HTC devices or on devices with Android 3.4.

description: What to buy? - it's a smart shopping list that can be used on the lock screen . Tired of having to remember a long time , what do you miss? Intelligent ranking system will choose the products that you commonly buy and offer to add them first in compiling the list. And if you want to add something new - just start writing it and the program will find the right product in the ever-expanding database. Also, due to the widget that can be placed on the desktop or ( on android version 4.2 and above) on the lock screen , you can use our list of " What to buy ? " even without removing the phone from the lock , simply including the screen. A function for sending allow to share your list with anyone in a couple of clicks .
release_text: - В полной версии добавлена фрункция чтения списка из смс. - Карточка вычеркнутых продуктов.(Отображает только последний продукт, при нажатии возвращает его и показывает предыдущий. Очищается при выходе из программы). В виджете отображает ТОЛЬКО ОДИН пункт - Ускорена работа с базой продуктов, больше нет подвисания при первом запуске - Уменьшен вес (всего 60 кб!)

description: JJPlay Big 2 (also known as 大老二, 鋤大D , 步步高升, Pusoy Dos), the best FREE Big 2 experience available on smartphones and tablets. Get ready to out wit your opponents in this Chinese classic. ONLINE MULTIPLAYER Automatic matchmaking – So you always find fun and challenging opponents. Or play with friends – Just log in with Facebook to connect with each other. Or play offline with the computer. COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY No advertising No registration No dangerous permissions MORE COOL FEATURES Full retina display support for crystal clear graphics. Also works great on budget devices down to (320x240) resolution. PLAY WITH ALL YOUR FRIENDS Supported Platforms: iOS, Android, Amazon, Blackberry Supported Languages: English, Chinese, Japanese Rules of the game can be found here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Two Please send your comments and suggestions to jjplaycardgames@gmail.com User Notes: Your rating is determined by online play against random players. Games with friends do not affect your online rating, but your wins against them are recorded separately. Try to finish a round that has started. If you quit prematurely, you need to pay your all opponents their maximum potential winnings. You can drag cards to reorder them manually. Playing with Facebook friends: To play with friends, from the main menu click “Multiplayer” then “Friends”. You will see available Facebook friends on the right side on the screen. Click “Add” to add friends to your game. Both you and your friends need to be in the game to see each other.

***** Please send us email with your problems. That way we can help you and possibly update the app version quickly. Don't write haphazard comments in ratings******* Please note that on some devices recording a call is no possible. So try this free version first and take that into consideration when rating the application. The Call Recorder is a simple, fun, and easy to use call recorder. Using this App you can Record your call and also select a type for specific person whether incoming or outgoing If you interested in Recording your Call then Search for "Call Recorder" or follow this link: Here Core features ★ Choose MP4 or 3GP to the audio output. ★ Unlimited time in telephone recordings. ★ You can select the person whose call you want to record and also specify the type for incoming or outgoing. ★ Widget which provides you full control to record your call ★ Delete voice recorded files ★ Run in background and automatically records your call ★ You can Play and Sort your Recorded files Tips: If you have a problem with the recording, please try to record with a different audio source, which you can configure in the settings. Try to record with speaker on or off , until you find the best combination for your phone. For example you can try Audio Source -> Mic and speaker on. Please note that on some devices recording a call is no possible so please take that into consideration when rating the application.

Fun and intuitive matching game for your baby or toddler! It helps to learn shapes and colors in game. Learning shapes is easy and entertaining and your child will love it too! 3 different educational games in one application: - match shapes with right one - choose right figure - catch all shapes! Understanding color and shape is a tool for learning many skills in all curriculum areas, from math and science to language and reading. When a child learns to discern the similarities and differences between colors and shapes, he is using the same skills he needs to recognize the differences between letters and numerals. The main skill that gives the application is differentiating the shapes. It includes both simple shapes, such as squares, triangles and circles and other shapes such as polygon, rhombuses, flowers to pique the older child's interest as well. By the time your child is 3 or 4 years old, children need to start learning their shapes. By the time they are ready to start kindergarten, children are expected to know the basic shapes, recognize them and identify how they form part of other items. They may also be expected to be able to draw the shapes – not perfectly, but certainly recognizably. Our application is an easy ways to encourage and help your child to learn about shapes with flashcards. Learning about shapes will help your child identify letters, and help them with writing and reading later on. For example, letters are made up of circles, triangles and lines – think of the circles in b, d, g, p, q, or the parts of a triangle found in k, v and w. Recognizing the shapes in the letters helps a child to recognize the letter too, important for developing reading skills. Colorful high resolution images, funny music and a lot of pleasure for your baby! This game is a small adventure for your baby. Let him shows to his parents how he learns shapes. Game is suitable for Preschool and Kindergarten level. We are trying to create simple, funny, but very attractive and addicting games in which children can play without help. This application is good for tablets and phones. Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Let Santa make your Kid's dreams come true Play with your kids and have lots of fun and laugh together :) Thanks to everybody who helps us to improve our games. We always welcome your feedback, comments and suggestions. Don't hesitate to contact us at entertainmentware@gmail.com Love, gifts, one heart, divided into two halves, - the main attributes of Valentine's Day. And to keep the romance of harmony and peace of your home, let your son or daughter to play our games. Teaching and entertaining at the same time, it will entertain your child and allow you to spend a romantic evening.

description: Xylophone and Piano for Kids is a funny game that emulate the xylophone for kids, toddlers and preschools. Your kids will make their own musical arrangements. Xylophone and Piano for Kids has tow sounds: 1. Xylophone sounds 2. Piano sound Furthermore, in this game you will find another two games, two mini games for toddlers and preschools, so you will have all you need for your kids in only one app. Mini game #1: Your toddlers and preschools have to click over the kids appear in the screen, in a small neighborhood. The game has no end. With this game, your kids will work their attention and the response velocity, and they will learn about the use of your mobile (phone or tablet) in a funny and practical way. Mini game #2: The train. This mini game emulates to the usual toys you can find in a typical toy store, and you give to your kids in order they can play in their playground. This game is a train with 4 windows and 4 animals with their pictures and sounds. Your kids have to press over the switch or button to open the window and listen the animal sound, and click over the open window to close it. It works in the same way of the real toy. With this game your kids will beguin to differentiate the animals through the sounds and the pictures of them. Both mini games have an nive background sound and a funny fx sounds.

Get full access to your existing Actsoft account while on the GO! Actsoft’s Manager App gives you the flexibility of monitoring your workforce with real-time data from the field using your mobile handset or Tablet. This application allows you to stay in touch with your mobile workforce by giving you access to key pieces of information in an easy to use application. Features: 1) Receive Real-Time activity updates when users fill out forms, clock in or clock out or turn their vehicles on or off. 2) Drill down on a specific device to display their Last known GPS position a Map. 3) Monitor the duration of certain activities like Stopped, Idle, or moving statuses. 4) Monitor your devices and see how long have they been clocked in for to comply with labor laws. 5) Use our Closest To feature to allow you to quickly find the nearest device to a specific location.

description: Get the right price for your sneakers. Whether you’re a buyer or seller, knowing the worth of your sneakers can come in handy. Shoefax provides you with up-to-date market values for many current sneaker releases based on eBay & Kixify sales data. Gain a deeper insight into the sneaker market. Know what sneakers are being looked at the most, analyze those that are peaking in value and examine recent releases. Each sneaker profile includes market value figures and an elegant interactive chart that tracks a shoe’s performance. When the price is right, hit buy and grab your pair from eBay or Kixify. With Shoefax, you will have all the tools needed to be an informed sneakerhead in one place. Some sneakers we cover: Air Jordans Nike Foamposites Lebron Kobe SB Yeezy Air Max

Blood Pressure Tracker helps you to record your blood pressure, heart rate and weight at anytime and in anywhere. You can trace passed record and shared with your doctors. [Features] 1. Log your systolic, diastolic, pulse and weight. 2. Shows statistics of systolic, diastolic, pulse and weight in max, min and avg. 3. Shows pie chart and line chart of blood pressure, heart rate and weight. 4. Add/delete/update records. 5. Add new record with default value. 6. List record by weekly, monthly and yearly. 7. Report in csv, html and excel xml 8. Export/Email report 9. Backup and restore database to SD card, Dropbox™ and Google Docs 10. Auto backup database to SD card when exiting the app 11. Auto backup database to Dropbox™ when exiting the app 12. Configurable weight unit, date format, time format, first day of week 13. Password protection 14. default email address for receiving report 15. Share database with multiple devices by using Dropbox™ Available languages (more coming soon) • English • 中文 • Português (Luis Costa) ※ If you like the app, then please give us a good rating as the driving force behind our continued development, thank you. ※ Since we can't reply reviews in the market, if you have any suggestions or questions please mail to our mailbox directly. For market reviews, please just leave your rating and cheers, thanks again. kw: hypertension, hypo tension, hypotension, high blood pressure, low blood pressure, pre-hypertension, pulse rate, track blood pressure, log blood pressure, blood pressure logger

description: Get cash back when you buy your favorite brands at nearby stores. From grocery to electronics to clothes and more, ditch the coupons and get paid real cash money just for shopping. Ibotta has exclusive rebates at your favorite grocery stores, retailers and online shops, updated all the time. And, we work with other offers, coupons, and discounts, so you know you’ll be getting the best deal every time you shop. Unlock your rebates anytime, anywhere, and then use them when you go shopping. Want to use Ibotta at the store for cash back? No problem. Prefer to wait until you get home? Or forgot your phone? That works too! And as for the cash you earn. Save it up and put that into your bank account via PayPal and Venmo, or turn it directly into gift cards from Best Buy, Starbucks, iTunes, Amazon.com and many more. Turn those gift cards into great gifts for your friends and family all year long. Need some references? ◆ Ibotta users have earned more than $19 million dollars, and we’re just getting started ◆ Selected by Google Play as a Staff Pick ◆ Featured on Good Morning America, ABC News & The Katie Couric Show Why bother with a coupon, discount code, or a promo code when you can get cash? Forget the hassle of paper coupons, or clipping and printing. Instead, use Ibotta to get cash back while you shop in-store or online. Check the app for exclusive offers from your favorite retailers, including: Walmart, Target, Costco, Best Buy, Sephora, Express, Aero, Sports Authority, Kohl's and others Looking to save more money online? Use Ibotta for additional savings on electronics, clothes, and more with stores like: Amazon.com, Peapod.com, Nordstrom.com, JCPenney.com, Eastbay.com, Footlocker.com, Clarks.com, Panasonic.com, MicrosoftStore.com, Skullcandy.com Shopping for health and beauty gifts, or looking to capture that priceless moment with your loved ones? Whole Foods Market, Birchbox.com, Sephora.com, Amazon.com, Shutterfly.com and Tinyprints.com Looking to liven up your parties with some beer, wine and spirits? Use Ibotta to get cash back on your favorites: Francis Ford Coppola Winery, mike’s hard lemonade, Seven Daughters, Black Box Wine, and SIMI And don't forget the groceries! We've got hundreds of dollars in rebates on leading brands at your nearby grocery stores: Walmart, Target, Kroger, Safeway, Costco, Sam’s Club, Publix, Rite Aid, Walgreens, CVS, Dollar General, Family Dollar, Meijer, HEB, Food Lion, Albertsons, and many more. With all of this great value and savings, it’s easy to see why Ibotta is the 16th most used app in the US. We’re the shopping app that’ll pay you cash for your favorite brands at your favorite stores. Note: Ibotta utilizes background location to show nearby rebates and stores. In addition, Ibotta can notify you of nearby rebates. You can customize these notifications in the settings section of Ibotta. Over 40 million illustrations, manga, Ugoira, and novels to enjoy for free! This is the official Android app of the illustration communication service "pixiv". Discover new artwork wherever you are! At pixiv, where "It's fun drawing", we aim to be the premier community for sharing and discovering new artwork. From anime and manga to fine art, our broad community of users shares a wide variety of artwork. We’ve now released a new function to handle animated illustrations called Ugoira which makes your series of illustrations into an animated one. ■Features ○Popular Works ・Enjoy the latest popular works. ・Find trending works over the past day, week, or month. ・Find out what's popular with users by gender with the "Popular with Males" and "Popular with Females" lists, enjoy original works with the "Original" list, or see what new users are up to with the "Rookie" list. ○New Works ・Check out new works from the users you're following. ・See new works from your friends or all pixiv users. Increase your creative inspiration! ○Search ・Search for works with your favorite keyword. ・Search for popular titles or characters. ・Search illustrations by tags or titles and novels by tags or body text. Find the novel where your favorite character makes an appearance halfway through! ・Sort search results by popularity. (Premium users only) ・Search for users as well. Your favorite illustrator might just be a pixiv user. Let's follow them! ・Keywords you search for often are stored in your search history. ・See the latest trends on pixiv with "Featured Tags". ○Feed ・Find out when the users you're following bookmark an illustration or start following someone. You just might find something you like as well. ○Favorites ・Bookmark your favorite works with a single tap! View your favorited works again anytime.

Crazy but true: One of the most popular photo editors just got even better. BeFunky now allows you to stack an UNLIMITED number of effects and edits, AND undo them! With this new version we’ve added new effects that will blow your mind, some more of the most popular ones, and powerful new editing tools. No registration is required to use BeFunky, and there are NO ADS, no watermarks, no limitations, and no forcing to share. BeFunky was made with you in mind, so it's exactly the way you want it to be. *WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT* -It has tons of effects that aren’t offered anywhere else. -Apply unlimited effects and edits to pictures, while controlling the amount of each. -Changed your mind? No worries, you can undo effects and edits too. -Make minor adjustments or completely transform your picture. -It couldn’t be easier to use! *AMAZING FEATURES* Over 30 effects offered: Vintage, Pop Art, Grunge, Viewfinder, DuoTone, Toy Camera, Sketch, Tilt Shift, Instant, Old Photo, Cross Process, Cyanotype, Gritty HDR, Pinhole, Orton, and many more. *POWERFUL EDITING TOOLS* Crop, straighten, rotate, sharpen, and add vignetting to any photo. Try our new features beautify and fill light, and make temperature adjustments. And as always: tools for exposure, hue, saturation, etc., are included. *MARVELOUS PHOTO FRAMES* Choose from Instant, Filmstrip, Halftone, Grunge, Classic frames, and more. *SHARE PHOTOS INSTANTLY* Save to your Camera Roll, Facebook Albums, Twitter, Flickr, Tumblr, and BeFunky's new interactive gallery.

description: Olvidate de ir al kiosco o escribir el SMS para pagar por el estacionamiento tarifado de Montevideo (Uruguay). Montevideo Parking facilita la compra de tickets de estacionamiento para clientes de ANTEL y MOVISTAR. Basta con registar tus vehículos o los de tus amigos (una ÚNICA vez) en la aplicación y ésta se encargará de generar y enviar el SMS de forma automática. El modo de 'envío programado' permite comprar tickets por adelantado en el día. Por ejemplo, si estaciona su vehículo a las 8am, puede comprar en ese mismo instante el ticket para que sea funcional a las 10am (hora de comienzo del servicio). Toda la interfaz fue diseñada para ser vista con facilidad por aquellos con visión reducida. Una vez comprado el ticket, su vehículo queda registrado en el sistema de la Intendencia de Montevideo. La policía verifica esta base de datos antes de multar los vehículos. Por lo tanto, no es necesario el ticket físico. A partir de febrero de 2014 la hora de estacionamiento tarifado tiene un costo de $ 24, existiendo la posibilidad de contratar un mínimo de 30 minutos ( valor $ 12 ) y luego en múltiplo de 30 minutos. Cinco minutos antes de que expire el tiempo contratado, el sistema envía un mensaje recordatorio de que el tiempo está por vencer. ---------- Área de estacionamiento tarifado ------------ Considerando las necesidades de los usuarios y aspectos técnicos, el horario de funcionamiento del sistema de estacionamiento tarifado es de lunes a viernes de 10 a 18, en el área geográfica delimitada por las siguientes calles: Al este: - Arenal Grande. Al oeste: - Colón (sin incluirla). Al sur: - Reconquista (sin incluirla). - Soriano (hasta M. Trueba). - Constituyente, hasta Carlos Roxlo y - J. E. Rodó (sin incluirla). Al norte: - Piedras (sin incluirla), entre Colón y Ciudadela. - Paysandú, entre Ciudadela y Av. Libertador Lavalleja. - Galicia, entre Av. Libertador Lavalleja y Ejido. - Mercedes, entre Ejido y Arenal Grande. Mapa: http://www.montevideo.gub.uy/sites/default/files/articulo/tarifado_a3.pdf -------------------------------------------------------- Forget going to the kiosk or write SMS to pay for parking tariffed Montevideo (Uruguay). Montevideo Parking makes buying tickets for parking and ANTEL MOVISTAR customers. Just registar your vehicle or your friends (one time) in the application and shall arrange to generate and send SMS automatically. Mode 'scheduled delivery' allows you to buy tickets in advance on the day. For example, if you park your car at 8am, you can buy at the same instant the ticket to be functional at 10am (starting time of the service). The entire interface was designed to be viewed easily by those with low vision. Once purchased the ticket, your vehicle is registered in the system of the Municipality of Montevideo. Police check this database before fining vehicles. Therefore, the physical receipt is not necessary. From February 2014 when tariffed parking fee is $ 24, with the possibility of hiring a minimum of 30 minutes (value $ 12) and then in multiples of 30 minutes. Five minutes before the expiry of the contracted period, the system sends a reminder that time is about to expire message. ---------- ------------ Parking area tariffed Considering the needs of users and technical aspects, hours of operation of parking tariffed are Monday to Friday from 10 to 18, in the geographic area bounded by the following streets: To the east:  - Arenal Grande. West:  - Columbus (not including). South:  - Reconquista (not including).  - Soriano (to M. Trueba).  - Constituent, to Carlos and Roxlo  - J. E. He rolled (not including). North:  - Stones (not including), between Columbus and Citadel.  - Paysandú between Citadel and Libertador Lavalleja.  - Galicia, between Libertador and Lavalleja Ejido.  - Mercedes, between Ejido and Arenal Grande. Map: http://www.montevideo.gub.uy/sites/default/files/articulo/tarifado_a3.pdf -------------------------------------------------- ------

description: *** JLPT N5 APPLICATION*** App for who is trying to pass N5 Japanese language proficiency test (JLPT). In this app we focused into Kanji and vocabulary. In order to pass N5, you have to memory about 100 Kanji, 800 new words and 21 grammar formulas. This first version of ours is quite enough for you all. Main functions of this app: ①VOCABULARY (語彙) - Choose testing mode ‘GOI’（語彙）, our data of about 800 words helps you practise better everyday. We currently set a range of 10 seconds to memory a word. We are researching in order to adjust a suitable value in next version. - For the test mode ‘Test’, we are currently support vocabulary test with English explaination. ②KANJI(漢字) - KANJI practice: This part is designed similar to the part GOI, with data of about 80 Kanji we support you to memory how to read these 80 kanji in Hiragana. ③GRAMMAR(文法) - Our data of about 21 grammar templates, helps you understand in reading and seeking grammar template quickly & exactly. Moreover, by this function JLPT N5 APP has specific examples for each grammar template. We hope you could memory the usage and how to make sentence. ④DICTIONARY(辞書) - We have about 1000 words which helps you lookup the meanings faster. - You also can use function Search for words’s meaning. Our desire is supporting Japanese learning community better, and to improve this app in next versions, we are glad to receive all of responses from every users. Greatful for your help! 皆さん！ご意見よろしくお願いいたします。

Japan GuideWithMe is an offline travel guide, which recommends detailed articles around the country in relation to your current location. Developed by travelers and for travelers, GuideWithMe is a rich source of general travel info as well as off the beaten track advice. Get around guides, phrase lists, warnings how to stay safe and healthy, restaurants and hotel recommendations, local costs and taxes, road rules and a variety of other info are carefully stored in one app. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ • USE OFFLINE. Save money on roaming fees and refer to the articles even if you are offline and cellular data is not available. • DISCOVER ARTICLES RELATIVE TO YOUR LOCATION. Switch between country, region, city, travel topic articles recommended for your travel destination and current location. Japan travel guide contains around 670 articles covering the whole country. • GET RELIABLE INFO. All info comes from wikivoyage project, which is constantly updated by adventurous travelers and aspiring writers. Articles are vividly illustrated with more than 1060 well­chosen pictures and images. • VIEW ON THE MAP. GuideWithMe is based on map data, provided by MAPS.ME, offline maps app. An option to view the place on offline map is offered. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ We are waiting for any advice and feedback about GuideWithMe app. This will help to suit GuideWithMe app to your expectations and tastes. Your reviews and ratings are always welcome. Send them to android@guidewithme.com or leave a feedback in Google Play review section. Check out our travel guides: http://guidewithme.com/ Follow us! Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/guidewithme Google +: http://plus.google.com/+Guidewithme/ Twitter: @GuideWithMe Enjoy your travels! IMPORTANT: currently the app is available only in the English language.
