My Credit Cards automatically manages all your credit cards in one place! My Credit Cards will store all information related to your credit card on your android phone by automatically understanding the messages that the banks send to you without fail! Everytime you carry out a transaction or make a payment or a bill is generated for your credit card, your bank sends you a SMS informing you of that. Now, ourselves, with all thats going on in our lives and so many cards that we own anyway, it's next to impossible to keep a track of all this. They serve as good updates, but the only way for us to find out what our current unbilled is or how much payment needs to be made this month or anything else, the only way to do it maintain a ledger somewhere. My Credit Cards simplifies all this. My Credit Cards reads these SMS, understands them and collates them in one place - on your android phone. How does this work? By itself! :) On a more serious note, here's a description of how it works: - It reads incoming SMS (on installation / update, it will read SMSs in your inbox) - It sends the SMS to our server (This is a point of contention, we understand, hence, we've given our thought process below) - The server understands the SMS and reverts with the key information from it - The mobile application receives this information, performs the relevant tasks and stores the information on a local database Thats it! Whenever you open the app, all information about your credit card is organized and waiting for you... Which Credit Cards work with this app? Currently, we support the following banks: - HDFC Bank - Citibank - ICICI Bank - IndusInd Bank - American Express - Standard Chartered (Regular / Manhattan) - American Express - HSBC - SBI - Axis Bank We'll keep expanding this portfolio of supported cards - thanks to our policy of processing the SMS online on our server. Why do we send your SMSs to our server? First off, we never store / read any of your personal SMS. Our objective : To provide a consistent and un-broken experience for our customers. The problems : 1. Banks keep changing their SMS formats 2. Every bank sends 4-5 different kinds of SMSs - for transactions, for payments, for bill generation and then there are variations amongst these. Multiply that with the number of banks and we have a huge no of possibilities. Also, these are ever-changing possibiliities. Our solution : We maintain the various "parsers" (a SMS format) on our server so that we can keep them updated. In which case, all the app needs to do is, send the SMS to the server and it will always know what to do with it. Do we store any personal information about you? No. At no point in time can we identify you with any personal information like your name, mobile no, your complete credit card no or your email address. The application generates a unique identifier on your phone the first time you run it and that is the only identification token that we have.
release_text: Version 1.2 - SMS prioritization - should work now on devices where SMSs were not being read by the app properly - Bug fixes - add EMIs easily now

description: A plug-in to the "Ghost Commander file manager" application which provides access to the Dropbox cloud storage and then let you to upload and download files to and from the Dropbox. The plugin does not work without Ghost Commander application itself! Install the main app at first, then download and install this plugin. To use the plugin, launch Ghost Commander, then find the Dropbox item in the home: list. A web browser should open which will be used to authenticate. Ghost Commander will never posses your Dropbox password, it just keeps the security token which will expire after a while. Please note, when you close the file manager you could see the web browser is still open. It's a known issue of the Dropbox API, please just close the browser.

Star Trek Ships Database is a summary of information of starship classes/types, shuttle classes/types and other space constructions (e.g. stations, pods) of major races/groups in Star Trek Universe. Information consist of textual description and illustrations of selected object (where available). Races/Groups taken into consideration: -Federation -Klingon -Vulcan -Romulan -Ferengi -Cardassian -Bajoran -Dominion and Allies -Borg -Xindi Database consists of 187 described objects along with 437 images. Images for only few ship classes are not available since they were never seen, only mentioned. Only ships, stations, shuttles etc. that were seen or mentioned in Star Trek series and movies were taken into consideration. Arbitrary ship designs were not taken into consideration. All images can be enlarged by touching icons in "Class details" section. Some ship classes have more images, so you can scroll horizontally to see them all. All ship names that were mentioned in Star Trek series and movies are listed. ***Star Trek, Starfleet, The United Federation of Planets and ALL related marks are trademarks of CBS, Paramount Pictures and ViaCom Productions. All rights reserved. *** Please contact us for any misleading or missing information in database: pineconetech@gmail.com

description: This puzzle game combines the fun of sudoku with our love for old-time bitmap graphics. Pixel puzzles, also known as nonograms, are logic puzzles. The numbers represent how many contiguous blocks of color there are. Pixler goes from beginner levels (5 by 5 puzzles) to absolutely insane challenges for masters (20 by 20). The innovative interface combines the ease of navigation while allowing you to see the entire puzzle all at once. Solving nonograms requires seeing the big picture all at once and Pixler delivers, allowing you to view the entire puzzle, zoom and pan. The optimized interface doesn't require you to precisely click on tiny cells with really big fingers. It comes packed with 35 beginner levels and over 60 advanced levels at each puzzle size (10x10, 15x15, and 20x20). And if that's not enough, it also comes with a Random puzzle mode where solvable random puzzles are generated, not just complete random patterns. Features such as "Remove Incorrect" and "Show Solution" help you out when you need an extra boost or get frustrated. Start with 5x5 black and white, then move to the 5x5 color puzzles. Experience the challenge of color puzzles which add a completely new dimension to basic nonograms. NOTE: Don't forget to fill in the white squares to. Long press the White and fill in the background to complete puzzles.

Foil, epee, saber! Even similar sports such as kendo, boxing and other target-area-related martial arts. Improve your reaction time and accuracy on target with this simple-to-use training aid. Start a training session with the tap of a button, then the app flashes (or calls out with audio) a randomly-chosen target area at a randomly-chosen moment --- and you strike (accurately, we hope). The training session continues as long as your endurance can last, just tap the button again to end the session and see your stats (simple stats for now, just how many touches you made it through). Customize your training profile with your target reaction time, which is the time between a target area flashing red (signaling you to attack) and flashing green. You can also customize the minimum and maximum delay before each "flash red" challenge; the wider the difference, the more widely random the challenges and the steadier your nerves need to be. Fencing (and boxing) are called "physical chess" for good reason! You can use the "DEFAULT" fencer and customize it. To share with friends or teammates, you can register any number of fencers by name and each keeps its own customized profile. To use Fencing Trainer in visual mode, simply hang your phone near a standard fencing target or convenient section of wall you don't mind messing up with your blade. When you see the red square flash, hit the corresponding quadrant of your target. The app also has a setting to switch from visual cues (the red flash) to audio cues. In audio mode, you can slip your phone in your pocket with earbuds and respond to challenges to the four standard quadrants in fencing - quarte (4, upper left of opponent), sixte (6, upper right), septime (7, lower left) and octave (8, lower right). BOXERS: Use this app to make shadow boxing more interesting. The 4 target areas translate well to boxing's left/right to head and left/right to body, jab vs uppercut, or whatever you wish to work on. If you find this app useful and would like a custom version using all the boxing target areas and punches, please email me at jolinapp@gmail.com with your interest in this idea. If there is enough interest I will publish a boxing-specific version. I'm not a boxer, so I'd appreciate suggestions (or a link) to what the standard targets or punches are. Support is via email to jolinapp@gmail.com . Please mention the name of the app ("Fencing Trainer"), the version number (found in the "Settings" menu) and a detailed description of the problem or suggestion. Note that it is not easy to hook up an electric blade to a USB port, my investigation so far tells me it would need a separate gadget (microcontroller or Bluetooth board) that would cost in the vicinity of $50. If you have serious interest in such a thing, email me. If there is enough interest I will look into a "Fencing Trainer Pro" that includes such a gadget mailed to you and can gather stats on your actual reaction time, target accuracy, etc.

Verbalizer Lite is a free video maker that lets you create hilarious lip flip videos that you can later share with friends. Choose any face - photos of your friends, pets, creepy animals, politicians or any celebrity you can think of - and record your video by planting your face or mouth over it and make them jibber something they'd never say! To make videos even funnier, we’ve also added a voice pitch selection, so you can sound like a chipmunk or like a ghost. Make a ranting lunatic out of a shy friend or exact revenge on your ex for leaving you by making him or her say things they would have never said. Once you’re done recording, share the video with everyone and share the laughter! FEATURES Animate any image: Gallery, Camera or from the Web, all from within the app! Move and resize the image to cover your recording screen Change your voice for hilarious results: Helium, Normal and Deep voice effects Customize the size and blend of the cutout Choose between Normal and Low quality video output Share your videos with the world! AWESOME VIDEOS IDEAS -Make your friends talk dirty -Make your pets admit guilt -Make fruits talk like the popular annoying orange -Make celebrities say hilarious things -Make fun of your politicians -Make your body parts talk -Create hilarious holiday greetings SIMPLE INSTRUCTIONS 1. Choose any face you want! 2. Cut out the part you want to record over and add voice effects. 3. Record your video and share the laughs with friends. Verbalizer is a funny application made for entertainment purposes only. TIPS Tested and working on: Samsung Glaxy S3/4/5, Nexus 4/5/7/10, HTC One M7, Sony Xperia Z/2 If your video rendering is stuck at 9.5% or 95%. close the app and record again, it should work. 勉強・スポーツ・唱題などで１日何時間という目標を決めて毎日の積み重ねをする場面で、毎回の時間を記録し合計時間を管理するアプリです。 ・今日の合計時間、今週の合計時間、今月の合計時間、全合計時間を表示します。 ・１日の目標時間と集計を始める日を登録して、今日までの合計目標に対して今どういう実績になっているかを表示します。 ・１日の目標時間は曜日別に時間設定できます。 ・過去５日間の履歴を表示します。 （一覧画面では全て表示します。） ・日々の実績は追加訂正も可能です。 ・ホームウィジェットによって、開始と終了の記録ができます。 ・１日の目標を達成した時、アラームと共にステータスバーで通知します。 （達成通知有無は設定によります） ・当日の目標時間は随時設定変更できます。 （目標差異時間をタッチすると変更画面になります） ・各月日々の目標達成状況を一覧表示できます。 （メニューから『目標達成状況』を選択してください。『≪＝』『＝≫』で月を変更します） ・実績はSDカードが装着されている場合、SDカードに記録します。 ・LYND3D(SH-03C) android2.2でのみ動作確認しています。
release_text: ver 1.3.0 ・目標時間を曜日別に設定するように変更しました。 アップデートインストール時は旧設定時間が全曜日に適用されます。 ・本日の目標時間を一時的に変更できるようにしました。 一日の目標を何回かに分けて実施する場合や、今日はあと何分追加！という場合に利用できます。 （今週、今月などの合計目標値の計算には影響しません） 『目標差異』で表示されている数値をタッチして下さい。 ・実績データのファイル構成を変更しました。 以前のバージョンからは、アップデート後初めて起動したときに変換します。 ・レイアウトをチョッとだけ変更しました。 ・その他、不具合修正など。 ver 1.2 ・ウィジェットが強制終了する不具合に対処しました。 ver 1.1 ・１日の目標を達成した時、アラームと共にステータスバーで通知する機能を追加しました。 ・目標達成通知の有無設定を追加しました。（初期値は『通知しない』） ・ウィジェットによって開始した時、目標までの残り時間を表示するように変更しました。

This set contains 4 skins :) - 12h format (black / white) - 24h format (black / white) ----------------------------------------------- Required ----------------------------------------------- - UCCW (Ultimate Custom Clock Widget) free. Before Downloading this skin, make sure UCCW 2.1.2 or higher is already installed on your device : http://goo.gl/TZgw0 - You have to use a Launcher app like Nova with marge options and set desktop vertical/horizontal marge to none (in order for your widget to stick to the top and sides. ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Install : ----------------------------------------------- 1 - Once you've downloaded/installed the skin, 2 - Add a UCCW widget to your homescreen (via long press on homescreen if you're running a launcher or via appdrawer if you're on stock ROM), 3 - When UCCW skins' list pops up, choose the skin to apply, 4 - Touch the pic 5 - Enjoy :) ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Use hotspots (new) : ----------------------------------------------- UCCW Skins can provide hotspots (or not) : This one got 4 hotspots. For the hotspots to work, in UCCW menu, turn Hotspot Mode ON. Now you can : - Touch the time to access Clock app, - Touch the date to launch Agenda app, - Touch the right icon to update your widget, - Touch the weather icon to access Google News and Weather. ----------------------------------------------- Tips ----------------------------------------------- - In the UCCW menu, if skin downloaded got a location and/or weather element, set the location to auto (if it's enable, then disable and enable it again for the location to work properly). - In UCCW skin's list, long press a skin to delete it, In some rare case your skin may not sho up in the UCCW skin list since there's a new encryption feature introduced in Jelly Bean. Google Play uses feature while installing skins. All third party themes and similar PAID apps like Beautiful widgets, Go launcher etc, are affected by this new encryption. If your are experiencing similar issue, please do not give this skin a bad rate and do the following : - Launch Titanium Backup and scroll down the list of installed apps. - Tap the downloaded theme app and tap backup. DON'T uninstall anything. - Tap the theme name again and restore the same backup that you had just created. Now the theme will work. If it doesn't or if you are on a non-rooted device, contact me and I'll send you another fix that'll work. 100% guarantee. ----------------------------------------------- FYI : Visit my xda thread and download it for free (*.uzip) http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1700008 -----------------------------------------------

description: * As seen on TV! * * Free version limited to 10 alarms * * New: compatibility with Google Now * * New home automation feature : compatibility with Philips Hue bulbs * _____________________________ Summary : Much more than a simple alarm clock, WakeVoice lets you interact with your phone using your voice: - Talk to it with custom commands to stop the alarm or activate the snooze option - Listen to your phone telling you about the weather, news of your choice or a personalized message while staying warm in your bed _____________________________ Details : Waking up is not an easy thing for you? You have never found the alarm clock you needed? Why not try WakeVoice! WakeVoice can overcome the negative aspect associated to regular alarm clocks, making your morning funnier and less difficult. The idea is simple: when the alarm rings, you just have to talk to WakeVoice to stop the alarm or activate the reminder. But that's not all! Once the ringing stopped, it's your phone's turn to talk to you. Customizable messages, weather of the day, news of your choice (RSS), radio... choose what you want to hear. Add to that all the settings imaginable on a clock (programming various alarms over several days, setting names, volume, times...) and you get WakeVoice, the most innovative alarm clock that you can find on the Android market. So now, with WakeVoice, you won't be angry anymore when you'll be waking up :) _____________________________ Warnings : - If you have a Sony Xperia device with Stamina mode enabled, please allow WakeVoice in the whitelist of the Stamina mode otherwise it will prevent alarms to ring - Don't force app2sd with WakeVoice. It's not recommended by Google for an alarm clock app. Furthermore, you'll have issues with Play Store updates _____________________________ If you have any issue, please report them at support@adnfx.com (you can also use the button directly in the app's settings)

app_name: Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids
description: It's time for bed and you've run out of ideas for lulling your baby to sleep? Try playing 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' on your Android™ phone and you'll be surprised to see your children doze off in a few minutes! We collected best “nursery rhymes” for kids especially for you and your little ones. You will enjoy soothing songs and relaxing sounds as your child enters the land of sweet dreams. Download best lullaby music for your baby sleep today and experience the bliss of a calm and peaceful parent. Good night and enjoy your healthy dreaming! ★Songs for kids on your mobile phone! ★Perfect sound to sleep to! ★Set time interval or let it sing constantly until your children fall asleep! ★These beautiful baby lullabies will help your child sleep like an angel! ★'How do I get a baby to sleep' is a question that will never pop in your mind again! ★These cute nursery songs are followed by beautiful backgrounds! Are you in desperate need of music for insomnia? 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is an amazing and most effective Android™ application that you can use at bedtime. Resting is crucial to your child's health and well-being. These “children songs” and lullaby music for babies will stay in your kids' memory throughout the entire life. Surprise them with these nursery lullabies - this is also a nice opportunity for your children to start learning nursery rhyme lyrics. Provide your kids with good quality baby music, wish them a goodnight and relax as long as you like! Get these songs for toddlers today and see for yourself! Your baby can't remain quiet? Crying can be their way of asking to be held close. Newborns sleep a lot – typically up to 16 to 17 hours a day. But most babies don't stay asleep for more than two to four hours at a time, day or night, during the first few weeks of life. The result? Lots of sleep for baby and a very irregular – and tiring – schedule for you. Your job is to respond to your newborn's cues, so you'll probably be up several times during the night to change, feed, and comfort him. Free lullabies can only help! 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is here, waiting for you to download it! Singing soothing lullabies and other children songs is a time-tested way to help a sleepy infant drift off. Your little one loves hearing her favorite sound — your voice — and the soft, infant music may calm her. Playing a CD or tape of music for toddlers, sleeping music, or other music for kids while you settle your newborn to sleep — and then leaving it on at low volume after you leave — can help ease the transition from being awake to falling asleep. A sound machine may soothe her, too, with the added benefit of drowning out outside noise. Legal info: ===== This is a free application. Songs are originally designated to lull a child and they are believed to be in a public domain. If you are an author of a song or you are aware that copyright belongs to a commercial author, please report to us immediately. Thank you!

This application uses an advanced formula, that takes into consideration not only your height, weight and waist, but also the hip, neck, wrist and forearm circumference (for women), in order to provide the most accurate body fat estimate you can get without specialized equipment. A person's body fat percentage is the total weight of the person's fat divided by the person's weight and consists of essential body fat and storage body fat. The body fat percentage is a good measure of an individual's fitness level, as it is the only body measurement which directly calculates the particular individual's body composition without regard to the individual's height or weight. The widely-used body mass index (BMI) provides a measure that allows for the comparison of individuals of different heights in terms of their weight. Due to differences in body composition the BMI is not necessarily an accurate indicator of body fat, for example individuals with greater than average muscle mass will have a higher BMI. Many bodybuilding and weightlifting enthusiasts measure their bodyfat percentage using a caliper skinfold test - a professional body fat caliper that measures the thickness of a fold of your skin with its underlying layer of fat. This is the most accurate way to measure your bodyfat, but unless you have the specialized caliper this free app provides the most detailed way to monitor your body composition and the effects of your exercise routine on your body, whether you are a gymrat, powerlifting fan, and bodybuilder or just trying to stay in shape.
release_text: * Totally new and fresh app design following Google's Material Design principles * Various bugs fixed * Reduced number of ads * The same super precise estimation formula

description: THIS VERSION IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED. LOOK FOR VERSION 3 HERE: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.bajasim.atc4real.pro Current users could migrate this app into the new version 3. More information at http://www.atc4real.com ------------------- ATC4Real is the most realistic ATC Simulator for Android. It gathers real airplanes flights timetables so you could control real world flights in your radar screen. You will be able to simulate an air traffic controller session at the following airports: - Pheonix Sky Harbor Intl Airport (KPHX / PHX) - Cancún Intl Airport (MMUN / CUN) - Düsseldorf Intl Airport (EDDL / DUS) The scenery is based in real data navigation so you could practice real STARs and SID procedures. Lead every arrival into the actives runways and clear them to land and guide all departures into their exit fixes. - Major improvements from previous version: - Engine coded from scratch for better performance and integration - Radar screen area increased up to 90 nm - Automatic SID and STAR navigation - Direct to fix command - Automatic or manual tower control - User rank system improved, now you will be promoted to new ranks as you progress unlocking sim features - Graphic interface reworked - Radar scroll and zoom handled by gestures (double tap and drag) - Emergencies added - Extended flight strip information - Select different colors for departures and arrivals echos - SID and STAR diagrams are shown in the radar screen - Pause added - Navaids are shown in three different modes: Just symbol, Symbol + Name and hidden. - Go around on landings added - Parallel runway takeoffs and landings improved - Metar offline improved - Preferred runways as in real airport for calm winds - Three airports packed in one single app Features: - ATC4Real simulates approach and departure control, plus take off and landing clearances - Real flight data gathered from real world timetables - Timetables are updated frequently - All controls are reachable through gestures (Tap, double tap and drag) so you do not need any keyboard input for main functions - Separated strips for Arrivals and departures - Toggle radar screen elements display (Map, rings, navaids, etc) - Terrain heights simulated, avoid crashing into mountains! - Fixes, vors and airports are accurate placed so you can practice instrument procedures published for current airport - Real weather updated every 15 minutes (Requires internet connection) - Satellite image as background optional - Radar screen zoom-able, so you can do precise vectors - User ranking system Compatibility: - We suggest you to install our free versions first to check your mobile device compatibility. - Adobe Air is required (Free download). You could be prompt to install it when starting. - This application has been designed for best viewing in HD tablets. Resolutions smaller than 800 x 600 pixels are not compatible. Start controlling now! Visit www.atc4real.com and check out all our airports. Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/bajasim Developed by Bajasim

description: The world's in disarray, gangsters are roaming the roads, someone has to stop them! Get into your trusty police car, get some speed and try to catch them all. How lon will you survive on the road alone? Tilt you phone or tablet to steer. Avoid collisions with anything on the road. Tap GO to accelerate, release it to brake. Tap and hold weapon buttons to shoot your gun and rockets. Destroy gangsters' vehicles, try to keep the civilians safe. Stay alive as long as you can! Features: - casual, but engaging and dynamic gameplay - coins for defeating the gangsters and driving longer and longer distances - 8 different police cars choose from - varius weapons and tools to aid you in your fight - amazing post-apocalyptic graphics Good luck! PS. Try playing the game while on the bus for added difficulty ;)

Party Light is for those who love being the center of attention, we have got you covered with Party Light! It's the original light show app that turns your phone in to a hypnotic light machine! Party Light makes use of your phones internal accelerometer, camera LED and microphone to pulse, strobe and mix various light effects based on sound and movement. Party Lights unique rave mode changes color based on how you hold your phone. No need for glowsticks, wave your phone for a multicolored rave light. When your at the club, rave or disco, just turn on Party Light and it takes over pulsing to the beat of the music it'll turn heads and creates a unique ambiance that makes you part of the experience! Party Light has multiple strobe, rave, color effects with more effects in the works! Camera Permission is for LED Strobe. Audio recording permission is for sound visualization only.

description: Gift Match game. Gift Match really fun game. Find a pair for each card and keep track of time. With each pair of match, you move on to the next level! Each level has its own set of cards. You will improve your memory skills. Try to beat all the levels, more and more difficult it becomes. You can submit your score online to compete against players from around the world.

QUICK ONLINE REFERENCE IN CLINICAL LIFE Gain easy acess to the award-winning AO Surgery Reference. AO Surgery Reference is an online repository for surgical knowledge. It describes the complete surgical management process from diagnosis to aftercare for all fractures of a given anatomical region, and also assembles relevant material that the AO has published before. It gives access to: * Hundreds of surgical procedures and approaches * Surgical decision making made easy with literature evaluated and prepared for quick reference * Hundreds of pages of previously published AO material The idea behind this service is the realization that reference in daily clinical life is often difficult. Frequently, there is little time during a hospital day to consult books or journals, or even to perform a literature search in order to gather evidence for a decision. The AO Surgery Reference allows surgeons to access much of the body of surgical knowledge for reference purposes during their clinical work. You might also want to visit the full-featured web-based version of AO Surgery Refence at www.aosurgery.org.
release_text: • The app will allow for the very first AOSpine material to be launched December 10, 2014. This is a major milestone in the AO Surgery Reference history. • Additional CMF material will be made available for AOCMF members
